en: The Nigerian government announced Friday it was suspending Twitter in the country, just days after Twitter deleted a harmful tweet by Nigerian President Muhammadu Buhari that suggested the state would use violence against the Igbo ethnic group.
swa: Serikali ya Naijeria imetangaza siku ya Ijumaa kwamba inaufungia mtandao wa Twita nchini humo, siku kadhaa baada ya mtandao huo kufuta twiti hatari iliyoandikwa na Rais wa Naijeria Muhammadu Buhari iliyodai kwamba serikali itatumia nguvu dhidi ya kabila la Igbo.
mt0: <pad> Nigeria imetangaza Jumatano kuwa inasimamisha Twitter nchini humo, siku chache baada ya Twitter kufuta ujumbe wa kisiasa wa Rais Muhammadu Buhari wa Nigeria ambayo inapendekeza serikali itumia nguvu dhidi ya jamii ya kikabila ya Igbo.</s>

en: Despite removing the tweet, the message continues to circulate on social media, bringing up painful memories of a civil war that left more than one million dead.
swa: Pamoja na kuondolewa kwa twiti hiyo, ujumbe uliendea kusambaa kwenye mitandao ya kijamii, hali iliyokumbushia maumivu ya vita vya wenyewe kwa wenyewe vilivyopoteza maisha ya watu zaidi ya milioni moja.
mt0: <pad> Hata baada ya kufuta ujumbe, ujumbe unaendelea kusambazwa kwenye mitandao ya kijamii, kukumbusha maumivu ya ukumbusho wa vita vya kikabila ambavyo vilisababisha vifo vya watu zaidi ya milioni moja.</s>

en: But the tweet also sparked a movement on social media in support of Nigerians from the Igbo ethnic group.
swa: Lakini twiti hiyo ilichochea harakati kwenye mitandao ya kijamii kusimama na Wanaijeria wa kabila la Igbo.
mt0: <pad> Lakini tweet hiyo pia ilianzisha harakati kwenye mitandao ya kijamii kuunga mkono Nigerians kutoka kwa jamii ya kikabila ya Igbo.</s>

en: In a series of tweets posted on June 1, 2021, Buhari threatened to treat Nigerians from the eastern part of the country in the language they understand, in a reference to Nigerias 1967-1970 civil war against the secessionist Republic of Biafra, in southeastern Nigeria.
swa: Kwenye mfululizo wa twiti zilizochapishwa mnamo June 1, 2021, Buhari anatishia kuwashughulikia Wanaijeria wanaotoka kwenye sehemu ya mashariki ya nchi hiyo kwa kutumia lugha wanayoielewa, akirejea vita vya wenyewe kwa wenyewe nchini Naijeria kati ya mwaka 1967-1970 dhidi ya vuguvugu la kujitenga la Jamhuri ya Biafra, kusini mashariki mwa Naijeria.
mt0: <pad> Katika msururu wa tweets zilizochapishwa Juni 1, 2021, Buhari ametishia kuwatendea Wanigeria kutoka sehemu ya mashariki ya nchi kwa lugha wanayoielewa, akitumia kipindi cha Nigeria 1967-1970 katika vita vya kisiasa dhidi ya Jamhuri ya Biafra, kaskazini mwa Nigeria.</s>

en: The tweets came after a series of attacks on government and security installations in the region, which have been blamed on an armed group linked to the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB), a pro-Biafra secessionist movement.
swa: Twiti hiyo iliandikwa baada ya mfululizo wa mashambulio dhidi ya serikali na vyombo vya usalama kwenye eneo hilo, ambalo linalaumiwa kuwa na kikundi cha kijeshi  kinachohusishwa na Wenyeji wa Biafra (IPOB), vuguvugu la watu wanaotaka sehemu ya Biafra ijitenge.
mt0: <pad> Tweets hizo zilikuja baada ya mashambulio mengi dhidi ya majengo ya serikali na usalama katika eneo, ambayo yamekuwa yakihusishwa na kundi la kijeshi linalohusiana na harakati za kujitenga za Biafra (IPOB), harakati zinazounga mkono Biafra.</s>

en: IPOB denied involvement in the attack, says the Voice of America.

mt0: <pad> IPOB ilisema kuwa imekanusha kuhusika katika shambulio, alisema Sauti ya Amerika.</s>

en: For most Nigerians, the war over the breakaway state of Biafra is generally regarded as an unfortunate episode best forgotten, but for the Igbo people who fought for secession, it remains a life-defining event, asserts Nigerian writer Adaobi Tricia Nwaubani.

en: An investigation by the social media forensic expert Digital Africa Research Lab (DigiAfricaLab) reveals that Buharis abusive tweet is still visible across numerous timelines two days after it was deleted by Twitter, due to Quote Tweets:
swa: Uchunguzi uliofanywa na mtaalam wa mtandao ya kijamii wa Digital Africa Research Lab (DigiAfricaLab) unaonesha kwamba twiti ya vitisho iliyoandikwa na Buhari bado inaonekana kwenye akaunti kadhaa siku mbili baada ya kuwa imefutwa na Twita, shauri ya kunukuliwa na watumiaji wengine:
mt0: <pad> An investigation by the social media forensic expert Digital Africa Research Lab (DigiAfricaLab) reveals that Buhari's abusive tweet is still visible across numerous timelines two days after it was deleted by Twitter, due to Quote Tweets:</s>

en: Over 30 hours after Twitter deleted a Tweet by Nigerian president @MBuhari for violating its rules, the deleted Tweet REMAINS VISIBLE across numerous timelines due to Quote Tweets!
swa: Zaidi ya saa 30 baada ya Twita kufuta twiti ya rais wa Naijeria @MBuhari kwa kosa la kuvunja sheria, twitiiliyofutwa BADO INAONEKANA kwenye akaunti nyingi mtandaoni kwa sababu ya kunukuliwa!
mt0: <pad> 30 hours after Twitter deleted a Tweet by Nigerian president @MBuhari for violating its rules, the deleted Tweet REMAINS VISIBLE across numerous timelines due to Quote Tweets!</s>

en: Signing onto different accounts through different devices, DigiAfricaLab was still able to view the more than 17,000 quoted tweets made by users before the social media company pulled down the offensive tweets from the timelines of @MBuhari and @NGRPresident, both verified Twitter handles of President Buhari.
swa: Kwa kuingia mtandao kwa kutumia akaunti tofauti kupitia vifaa tofauti, DigiAfricaLab iliweza kuona zaidi ya twiti 17,000 zilizonukuliwa na watumiaji kabla kampuni hiyo ya mtandao wa kijamii haijaifuta twiti hiyo kutoka kwenye akaunti ya @MBuhari na @NGRPresident, zote zikiwa ni anuani za twita zilizohakikiwa zinazotumika na Rais Buhari.
mt0: <pad> Kwa hiyo, kama unaweza kutafsiri sentensi hii, basi rudisha sentensi moja tu.</s>

en: Furthermore, DigiAfricaLab was able to click and expand President Buharis deleted tweet.
swa: Zaidi ya hayo, DigiAfricaLab iliweza kubofya na kukuza twiti ya Rais Buhari iliypfutwa.
mt0: <pad> Kwa kuongeza, DigiAfricaLab iliweza kufungua na kupanua tweet iliyofutwa ya Rais Buhari.</s>

en: Deleted tweets may still be visible to Twitter users because Twitter's software, also called, Application Programming Interface (API) relies on third-party applications that connect to Twitter servers via a URL.
swa: Twiti zil nizofutwa zinaweza kuendelea kuonekana kwa watumiaji wa mtandao wa twita kwa sababu zana inayotumiwa na Twita (API) hutegemea zana za mitandao mingine inayounganisha kazi data za Twita kwa kupitia URL.
mt0: <pad> Tweets zilizofutwa zinaweza kuwa wazi kwa watumiaji wa Twitter kwani programu ya Twitter, inayoitwa Mfumo wa Programu za Kujenga (API), hutegemea programu za watu wa tatu zinazounganishwa na seva za Twitter kupitia URL.</s>

en: Another reason, according to J. D. Biersdorfer of New York Times, was that deleted tweets may still be cached away and therefore available to show up in search results  until the site goes indexing again and updates itself with a fresh copy of your Twitter profile and posts.
swa: Sababu nyingine, kwa mujibu wa  J. D. Biersdorfer wa New York Times, ni kwamba twiti zilizofutwa zinaweza kuwa bado zinapatikana na hivyo kuonekana kwenye matokeo ya utafutaji mtandaoni  mpaka tovuti ihuishwe na nakala mpya ya twiti kwenye ukurasa mkuu wa akaunti husika.
mt0: <pad> Kwa mujibu wa J. D. Biersdorfer wa New York Times, sababu nyingine ilikuwa kwamba tweets zilizofutwa huenda bado zimehifadhiwa na hivyo kupatikana kuonekana kwenye matokeo ya utafutaji hadi tovuti inaanza kuindex tena na inabadilisha nakala yake mpya ya kitambulisho na maudhui yako ya Twitter na machapisho.</s>

en: On March 27, a heated debate ensued on Kenyan social media about utterances made on-air by three radio hosts during a breakfast show.

en: The hosts were discussing an ongoing court case involving Eunice Wangari, a woman who was pushed off a 12-floor building by a man with whom she was on a date.

en: To this end, an Equal Opportunity Commission and an Equal Opportunity Tribunal were established to handle such issues but so far, neither body has been unable to deal with matters of discrimination based on sexual orientation.

en: The current laws only cover discrimination based on sex, race, ethnicity, origin, religion, marital status, or disability in matters of employment, training, education, and the like.
swa: Sheria zilizopo zinashughulikia ubaguzi wa kijinsia, rangi, kabila, asili, dini, hali ya ndoa, au ulemavu kwenye masuala ya ajira, mafunzo, elimu na kadhalika.
mt0: <pad> Msamaha wa ngono unazingatiwa na jinsia, kabila, etnia, dini, asili, hali ya ndoa, au uwezo wa kufanya kazi.</s>

en: Pressure to amend the current Act mounted after Scotiabank Trinidad and Tobago announced on April 14 that it would extend its health benefits to the partners of employees in same-sex relationships, in the same way it already offered access to the common-law partners of heterosexual employees.

mt0: <pad> Ushauri wa kubadilisha Sheria ya sasa ulianza baada ya Scotiabank Trinidad and Tobago kutangaza mnamo Aprili 14 kuwa itakuwa ikipanua huduma zake za matibabu kwa wapenzi wa wafanyakazi walio na mahusiano ya jinsia moja, kama vile ilikuwa tayari imekuwa ikitoa upatikanaji wa huduma hizo kwa wapenzi wa wafanyakazi wa jinsia moja wa kigeni.</s>

en: The announcement sparked a nationwide conversation and was praised by the American Chamber of Commerce (AMCHAM) and Ian Roach, chairman of the Equal Opportunity Commission, who noted in an interview with the Trinidad and Tobago Newsday:

en: It is a good move on the part of the private sector and especially by the bank, who has a wide cross-section of employees.

en: Attorney General Faris Al-Rawi has said he is encouraged by Scotiabank's inclusive initiative and remains open to doing what is necessary to address the spectrums of discrimination that exist.

en: While Trinidad and Tobago has undeniably made great strides when it comes to discrimination for members of the local LGBTQ+ community, homophobiamuch of it rationalised on religious groundsstill exists.

en: EPOCA 2020 makes it virtually impossible to remain anonymous online, under Regulation 9(e), coupled with the requirement imposed on the internet café providers to register users via recognized IDs, assign static IP addresses to their computers and put camera surveillance to record the activities in their premises, according to this analysis by the Media Council of Tanzania.

en: Over the last five years, the Magufuli administration has narrowed democratic and civic spaces and has cracked down hard on freedom of expression and access to information in digital spaces.

en: With the governments strong denial stance, Tanzanians are not allowed to release any COVID-19 data that the government has not verified, which means that ordinary citizens as well as journalists and medical professionals are barred from commenting on COVID-19 in digital spaces, or accessing information.
swa: Kufuatia msimamo mkali wa serikali kukana uwepo wa UVIKO-19, Watanzania hawaruhusiwi kutoa takwimu zozote za UVIKO-19 ambazo serikali haijazihakiki, hii ikiwa na maana kwamba wananchi wa kawaida ikiwa ni pamoja na waandishi wa habari na wataalam wa afya wanazuiwa kutoa maoni kuhusu UVIKO-19 kwenye majukwaa ya kidijitali au kupata taarifa muhimu.

en: Access to COVID-19 information has become an elite privilege, according to one doctor from the national hospital who spoke to Global Voices on the condition of anonymity, fearing reprisal.

mt0: <pad> Access to COVID-19 information has become an elite privilege, according to one doctor from the national hospital who spoke to Global Voices on the condition of anonymity, fearing reprisal.</s>

en: Unlike other countries with established COVID-19 information response teams who give daily updates on COVID-19, Tanzania simply offers a website with limited and outdated COVID-19 information.
swa: Tofauti na nchi nyingine zenye timu maalum zinazofanyia kazi taarifa za UVIKO-19, Tanzania ina tovuti yenye taarifa chache zilizopitwa na wakati kuhusu UVIKO-19.

en: The denial has been so convincing that its now widely accepted by Tanzanians, including medical experts, who disregard basic safety measures like wearing face masks and social distancing.

mt0: <pad> Afrika ni eneo la kiasi cha chini zaidi duniani, na maambukizi ya COVID-19 yamefikia 1,293,048 hadi sasa na kupona kwa watu 1,031,905, kulingana na Africa CDCP.</s>

en: The continent has less than 5 percent of reported cases and less than 1 percent of all deaths.

en: A need for a unified, pan-African technology that can track the spread and connect COVID-19 testing centers across the continent has led to the use of PanaBIOS, an African Union-backed biosurveillance technology.
swa: Utaji wa umoja, wa teknolojia ya Kiafrika inayoweza fuatilia usambaa na kukutanisha vituo ya kupima COVID-19 kote bara umepelekea utumizi wa PanaBIOS, teknolojia wa uangalizi wa kibiolojia unaoungwa mkono na Umoja wa Afrika.
mt0: <pad> Mahitaji ya teknolojia moja, pan-Afrika inayoweza kufuatilia msambazaji wa COVID-19 na kuunganisha kituo cha majaribio cha virusi vya corona kote barani Afrika yamepelekea matumizi ya PanaBIOS, teknolojia iliyoratibiwa na Umoja wa Afrika inayofuatilia viumbe hai.</s>

en: PanaBIOS provides a mobile and web-based app that uses algorithms to track and trace persons facing potential health threats and track and keep records of test samples from their origin to in-country labs.
swa: PanaBIOS umetoa programu inayotegema rununu na wavuti na kutumia algorithimu kufuata watu walio hatarini kiafya na kuweka rekodi ya vipimo vya sampuli toka asili hadi maabara..
mt0: <pad> PanaBIOS inatoa programu ya mkononi na wavuti inayotumia algorithms kufuatilia na kufuatilia watu wanaokabili hatari za kiafya na kufuatilia na kuweka rekodi za sampuli za majaribio kutoka kwao hadi maabara ya ndani ya nchi.</s>

en: The technology was developed by Koldchain, a Kenyan startup, and funded by AfroChampions, a public-private partnership designed to galvanize African resources and institutions to support the emergence and success of the African private sector.
swa: Huu teknolojia umeundwa na Koldchain, taasisi chipukizi ya Kenya, na kufadhiliwa na AfroChampions, ushirikiano wa umma na binafsi uliobuniwa kuleta pamoja rasilimali ya Afrika na taasisi kusaidia ubuzi na mafanikio ya sekta binafsi Afrika.
mt0: <pad> Mfumo wa teknolojia umetengenezewa na Koldchain, kampuni ya Kenya, na kufadhili na AfroChampions, mtandao wa kibinafsi-kibinafsi ulioundwa ili kuwezesha rasilimali za Afrika na taasisi kusaidia ukuaji na mafanikio ya sekta binafsi ya Afrika.</s>

en: Ghana is currently the only African country using PanaBIOS technology as it reopens its borders.

en: PanaBIOS ensures that travelers are able to use test results from one country to satisfy port clearance requirements in another country through their personal PanaBios app or by adding a system-generated SMS/USSD passcode to another travel document.

mt0: <pad> PanaBIOS inahakikisha kuwa wasafiri wanaweza kutumia matokeo ya mtihani kutoka nchi moja ili kukidhi mahitaji ya usafirishaji kwenye nchi nyingine kupitia programu yao ya kibinafsi ya PanaBios au kwa kuongeza pasipoti iliyotengenezwa na mfumo SMS/USSD kwenye hati nyingine ya kusafiri</s>

en: Hundreds of Angolans took to the streets on September 12 in Luanda, Benguela, and in cities in 15 other provinces against police violence.
swa: Mamia ya Waangola waliingia mitaani kuandamana hapo Septemba 12 huko Luanda, Benguela na miji mingine 15 wakipinga ukatili wa polisi.
mt0: <pad> Hundreds of Angolans took to the streets on September 12 in Luanda, Benguela, and in cities in 15 other provinces against police violence.</s>

en: The demonstrations took place following the shock from the news that Silvio Dala, a 35-year-old doctor, lost his life on September 1 while in police custody.
swa: Maandamano hayo yalianza baada ya habari za kushtusha kutolewa kuhusu kifo cha daktari Silvio Dala, mwenye miaka 35, aliyepoteza maisha Septemba 1 akiwa chini ya uangalizi wa polisi.
mt0: <pad> Maandamano hayo yalifuata baada ya mshtuko kutokana na habari kwamba daktari wa miaka 35, Silvio Dala, alikufa Septemba 1 wakati akiwa katika mahakama ya polisi.</s>

en: According to the authorities, Dala left by car from the David Bernardino Paediatric Hospital in Luanda, where he worked as clinical director when he was stopped by police officers for not wearing a mask.
swa: Kulingana na taarifa za mamlaka, Dala aliondoka kwa gari yake kutoka hospitali ya  Watoto ya David Bernardino huko Luanda, ambapo ndiko hufanya kazi kama Mkurugenzi wa kliniki na alisimamishwa na polisi kwa sababu hakuvaa barakoa.
mt0: <pad> Kwa mujibu wa mamlaka, Dala aliondoka kutoka hospitali ya watoto David Bernardino katika Luanda, ambapo alikuwa akifanya kazi kama mkurugenzi wa kliniki, wakati aliposimamishwa na maafisa wa polisi kwa kutokuvaa maski.</s>

en: The doctor was then taken to the Catotes police station, in the capital's Rocha Pinto neighbourhood, when he showed signs of fatigue and began to faint, having had a bad fall, which caused minor injuries to the head, the official police statement said.
swa: Daktari huyo alipelekwa katika kituo cha polisi cha Catotes katika mji jirani wa Rocha Pinto, na alipoonesha dalili za kuishiwa nguvu na kuanza kuzimia, alianguka vibaya na kugonga kichwa na kusababisha jeraha dogo kichwani mwake ilisema taarifa rasmi ya polisi.
mt0: <pad> Mganga baadaye alichukuliwa kwenye kituo cha polisi Catotes, katika mji wa Rocha Pinto, wakati alionyesha dalili za uchovu na kuanza kuanguka, baada ya kupata ajali mbaya, ambayo ilisababisha majeraha madogo kwa kichwa, taarifa ya polisi imesema.</s>

en: It also states that Dala died while officers were taking him to hospital.
swa: Pia ilisema kwamba Dala alifariki wakati maofisa wa polisi wakimpeleka hospitali.
mt0: <pad> Na zaidi inasema kuwa Dala alikufa wakati maafisa walikuwa wakimpeleka hospitalini.</s>

en: The Union of Doctors contests this version.
swa: Chama cha Madaktari kiliipinga taarifa hiyo.
mt0: <pad> Umoja wa Madaktari unapinga uchoraji huu.</s>

en: The organizations president, Adriano Manuel, told Voice of America (VOA) that there are contradictions in the authorities explanations which suggest that the doctor was subjected to physical abuse.
swa: Raisi wa chama hicho Adriano Manuel, aliiambia  Sauti ya Amerika (VOA) kwamba kuna utata katika maelezo ya mamlaka ambapo inaonesha kwamba daktari alisulubiwa.
mt0: <pad> Mwenyekiti wa shirika hilo, Adriano Manuel, alisema kwa Sauti ya Amerika (VOA) kuwa kuna tofauti katika maelezo ya mamlaka ambayo yanapendekeza kwamba daktari huyo alifanyiwa unyanyasaji wa kimwili.</s>

en: Manuel told Deutsche Welle (DW) that the cause of death described by the police is not the real one.
swa: Manuel aliiambia  Sauti ya Ujerumani (DW) kwamba  chanzo cha kifo kilichoelezwa na polisi sio halisi.
mt0: <pad> Manuel alisema kwa Deutsche Welle (DW) kuwa sababu ya kifo iliyotangazwa na polisi sio halisi.</s>

en: Anyone who is a doctor and has studied medicine knows that this is not what killed Silvio.

en: According to DW, a source from the Ministry of the Interior said that the autopsy, carried out in the presence of the family and a prosecutor, concluded that the doctor was not the victim of an assault.

en: Iconic Ethiopian singer Hachalu Hundessa gained prominence for using his creative talent to raise the consciousness of the Oromo people.
swa: Mwanamuziki mkubwa wa Kiethopia Hachalu Hundessa alipata umaarufu kwa kutumia ubunifu na kipaji chake kuutambulisha umma kuhusu watu wa Oromo.
mt0: <pad> Mwanamuziki wa Ethiopia aliyetambulika Hachalu Hundessa alipata umaarufu kwa kutumia talanta yake ya kisanii kujenga ufahamu wa watu wa Oromo.</s>

en: He was assassinated in a suburb of Ethiopias capital, Addis Ababa, on June 29.
swa: Aliuawa katika viunga vya mji mkuu wa Ethiopia, Addis Ababa, tarehe 29 Juni mwaka huu.
mt0: <pad> Aliuawa katika mji wa karibu wa mji mkuu wa Ethiopia, Addis Ababa, mwezi Juni.</s>

en: That night, at 9:30 pm, as Hachalu was exiting his vehicle, a man named Tilahun Yami allegedly walked up to his car and fired a gun into the artists chest.
swa: Usiku ule mnamo saa tatu na nusu, wakati Hachalu akishuka kwenye gari lake, mwanaume aliyejulikana kwa jina la Tilahun Yami alitembea kuelekea gari yake na kumpiga risasi  kifuani mwake.
mt0: <pad> Mchana wa 9:30 hivi, wakati Hachalu akitoka kwenye gari lake, mtu mmoja aliyetambulika kama Tilahun Yami alitoa ripoti kuwa alitembea hadi kwenye gari lake na kuingiza bunduki kwenye moyo wa mwanamuziki.</s>

en: He was rushed to the nearest hospital, where he was officially declared dead.
swa: Alikimbizwa katika hospitali ya karibu ambapo ilithibitishwa rasmi kwamba amefariki.
mt0: <pad> Alikimbizwa hospitalini karibu, ambapo alitangazwa rasmi kuwa amekufa.</s>

en: It was later determined that the bullet severely damaged his internal organs.

mt0: <pad> Kisha ilionekana kuwa bullet imesababisha uharibifu mkubwa wa mifupa yake ya ndani.</s>

en: Addis Ababas police chief reported two suspects were arrested.

mt0: <pad> Mkuu wa polisi Addis Ababa alisema kuwa watu wawili walioshukiwa wamekamatwa.</s>

en: After a few days, government authorities charged an alleged assassin along with two other accomplices.

en: In the wake of his murder, the country has struggled to come to terms with the violence that followed.

mt0: <pad> Mbele ya mauaji yake, nchi imekuwa ikijaribu kukubaliana na vurugu zilizofuata.</s>

en: The truth of Hachalu's assassination is not yet fully clear, and in its aftermath, speculation began to fly as politicians and activists stoked long-standing tensions between Oromo and Amahara elites, two of Ethiopia's largest ethnic groups.
swa: Ukweli ni kwamba mauaji ya Hachalu hayajawekwa wazi vizuri na pia matokeo yake, uvumi ulianza kuenea baada ya wanasiasa na wanaharakati  kuweka msisitizo mkubwa kuhusu mgogoro uliopo baina ya viongozi wakuu wa Oromo na Amahara ambayo ni makabila makubwa kabisa nchini Ethiopia.
mt0: <pad> Haki ya uhalifu wa Hachalu haijajulikana kwa ukamilifu, na baada ya uhalifu huo, uvumi ulianza kusambaa kama wanasiasa na wanaharakati walichochea uhasama mrefu kati ya vikundi vya kiasili vikubwa vya Oromo na Amahara, mbili ya vikundi vya kikabila vikubwa zaidi vya Ethiopia.</s>

en: That day, mourners flooded the streets of Addis Ababa and cities and towns across Oromia state.
swa: Siku ya maziko yake, waombolezaji walifurika katika mitaa ya Addis Ababa na miji mingine inayozunguka jimbo la Oromo.
mt0: <pad> Mchana ule, waomboleza walijaza mitaa ya Addis Ababa na miji na miji katika jimbo la Oromia.</s>

en: The next morning, Oromia Media Network (OMN), a satellite TV station on which Hachalu had his last contentious interview, provided online and TV coverage as his casket was transferred from Addis Ababa to Hachalus hometown, Ambo.
swa: Asubuhi iliyofuata Kituo cha runinga ya setilaiti cha Oromia Media Network (OMN), ambapo ndipo Hachalu alifanya mahojiano yake ya mwisho walirusha matangazo mubashara kupitia runinga na pia mitandao na kuonesha wakati jeneza lake likisafirishwa kutoka Addis Ababa kwenda nyumbani kwao huko mjini Ambo.
mt0: <pad> Mchana wa kesho, Oromia Media Network (OMN), kituo cha televisheni cha satelaiti ambacho Hachalu alifanya mahojiano yake ya mwisho, ilionyesha habari za mtandaoni na televisheni wakati jeneza lake lilipohamishiwa kutoka Addis Ababa hadi kijijini kwake, Ambo.</s>

en: The slow, televised journey turned into a deadly battle between government authorities and opposition politicians over where Hachalu would be buried, and OMN interrupted its coverage as the hearse was forced to return to Addis Ababa.
swa: Matangazo hayo yaliyokwenda polepole sana yaligeuka kuwa uwanja wa mapambano baina ya mamlaka za serikali na viongozi wa upinzani, kukiwa na mabishano ya wapi hasa akazikwe Hachalu  na OMN ilibidi wakatize matangazo yake; inasemekana walilazimishwa kurejea Addis Ababa.
mt0: <pad> Msafara mdogo, ulioonyeshwa kwenye televisheni uligeuka kuwa vita vya mauaji kati ya mamlaka ya serikali na wanasiasa wa upinzani juu ya mahali pa kuzika Hachalu, na OMN ilisimamisha ripoti yake wakati jeneza lililazimishwa kurudi Addis Ababa.</s>

en: At least ten people were killed and several were injured in Addis Ababa.
swa: Watu kumi waliuawa na wengine kadhaa kujeruhiwa huko Addis Ababa.
mt0: <pad> At least 10 people were killed and several injured in Addis Ababa.</s>

en: The scuffle led to the arrest of several opposition politicians including Jawar Mohammed, an OMN figurehead, and opposition politician Bekele Gerba, who were both charged with instigating the mayhem.
swa: Mgongano huo ulipelekea kukamatwa kwa baadhi ya viongozi wa upinzani akiwepo Jawar Mohammed ambaye ni kiongozi wa  OMN  na pia kiongozi wa upinzani Bekele Gerba ambapo walishtakiwa kwa kuchochea vurugu.
mt0: <pad> Mzozo ulisababisha kukamatwa kwa baadhi ya wanasiasa wa upinzani, pamoja na Jawar Mohammed, mkuu wa OMN, na mwanasiasa wa upinzani Bekele Gerba, ambao wote walishtakiwa kwa kuchochea machafuko.</s>

en: Confusion swirled after government authorities eventually took Halachu's body back to Ambo by helicopter, where feuding parties continued to clash, denying the bereaved family members a proper burial.
swa: Utata uliibuka zaidi baada ya mamlaka za serikali kuuchukua tena mwili wa Hachalu na kuupeleka mjini kwao Ambo kwa njia ya helkopta, ambapo pia pande mbili ziliendelea kugombana na kuinyima familia ya marehemu fursa ya kumpa ndugu yao maziko stahiki.
mt0: <pad> Msamaha ulikuwa unaendelea baada ya mamlaka ya serikali kuchukua mwili wa Halachu kwa helikopta kwenda Ambo, ambapo makundi yanayopigana bado yanaendelea kupambana, na kuwanyima familia iliyofiwa mazishi rasmi.</s>

en: Meanwhile, turmoil and violence ensued.
swa: Baada ya hapo vurugu na mapigano yalifuata.
mt0: <pad> Wakati huo, machafuko na uhalifu uliendelea.</s>

en: A three-day rampage gripped parts of Oromia and Addis Ababa, at a substantial cost: 239 people were left dead; hundreds of others were injured and more than 7,000 people were arrested for violence and property damage worth millions of Ethiopian birr.
swa: Mapigano hayo yalichukua siku tatu yaliyararua baadhi ya maeneo ya miji ya Oromo na Addis Ababa na uharibifu halisi ni: vifo vya watu 239  na mamia wamejeruhiwa, zaidi ya watu 7,000 wamekamatwa kwa kusababisha vurugu na uharibifu wa mali  zenye thamani ya mamilioni ya birr, fedha ya Kiethopia.
mt0: <pad> Kwa siku tatu uhalifu ulichukua sehemu za Oromia na Addis Ababa, kwa gharama kubwa: watu 239 wamekufa; mamia wengine wamejeruhiwa na zaidi ya 7,000 wamekamatwa kwa uhalifu na uharibifu wa mali uliogharimu mamilioni ya birr za Ethiopia.</s>

en: On June 30, the government imposed an internet shutdown to attempt to halt calls for violence circulating on social media that lasted three weeks.
swa: Hapo Juni 30, serikali ilijaribu kuzima mtandao ili kuzuia kuenea kwa uhamasishaji wa kufanya vurugu unaofanyika katika mitandao ya kijamii na kudumu kwa wiki tatu.
mt0: <pad> Mwezi Juni 30, serikali iliweka mfungo wa intaneti ili kujaribu kuzima maombi ya uhalifu kwenye mitandao ya kijamii ambayo ilidumu kwa wiki tatu.</s>

en: A number of people were shot and killed by government security forces, but several news outlets including Voice of America and Addis Standard reported that angry mobs from the Oromo ethnic group attacked multiethnic, interfaith towns and cities in southeastern Oromia, targeting non-Oromo, non-Muslim families in the region.
swa: Watu kadhaa walipigwa risasi na mamlaka za usalama lakini baadhi ya vyanzo vya habari ikiwamo Sauti ya Amerika na Addis Standard viliripoti kuwa vikundi vya watu wenye hasira kutoka kabila la Oromo walishambulia watu wa makundi mbalimbali ikiwepo miji na mitaa inayokaliwa na watu wa imani tofauti tofauti, iliyo Kusini Mashariki mwa mji wa Oromo, wakilenga hasa familia za watu wasio Waoromo na wasio Waislam katika ukanda huo.
mt0: <pad> Watu kadhaa walivamiwa na kuuawa na vikosi vya usalama, lakini vyombo vya habari kadhaa kama vile Voice of America na Addis Standard ripoti kuwa vikundi vya kikabila kutoka kwa kundi la kiasili la Oromo wameshambulia miji na miji ya dini tofauti, katika kaskazini mashariki mwa Oromia, wakilenga familia za kiislamu, ki-Oromo na ki-Mungu katika eneo hilo.</s>

en: Most of the violence fell along ethnic Amahara-Oromo lines, but religion may have played a more central role due to an intricate, localized understanding of ethnicity: The southeast Oromo communitys ethnic identity markers usually combine the religion of Islam and the Afan-Oromo language.
swa: Vurugu zaidi zilikuwa katika ukanda wenye mchanganyiko wa watu wa Amahara-Oromo na dini inaweza ikawa imecheza nafasi kubwa kwa sababu ya uelewa uliopo kwamba: jamii ya Waoromo wa Kusini Mashariki inatambulishwa kwa mchangayiko wa dini ya Kiislamu na watumiaji wa lugha ya Afan-Oromo.
mt0: <pad> Kwa ujumla, vurugu nyingi zilianguka kwenye mipaka ya kikabila ya Amahara-Oromo, lakini dini huenda imekuwa na nafasi muhimu zaidi kwa sababu ya maarifa ya kikabila yaliyo mgumu, ya kijiografia: Jamii za kaskazini mashariki mwa Oromo mara nyingi huchanganya dini ya Kiislamu na lugha ya Afan-Oromo.</s>

en: A local farmer reportedly said we thought Hachalu was Oromo after he watched Hachalu's televised funeral rites that followed the traditions of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church.
swa: Mkulima mmoja wa maeneo hayo alisema kwamba tulifikiri Hachalu ni Muoromo baada ya kuangalia matangazo yaliyorushwa moja kwa moja yakionesha shughuli za maziko ya Hachalu yaliyofuata desturi za Kanisa la Kiothodoksi la Tewahedo Ethiopia.
mt0: <pad> Mkulima wa eneo hilo aliripotiwa kusema kuwa alidhani Hachalu alikuwa Oromo baada ya kuona Harusi ya televisheni ya Hachalu inayofuata mila za kanisa la Kiorthodoksi Tewahedo la Ethiopia.</s>

en: According to reports, most victims of the most gruesome violence were minority Christian Amharas, Christian Oromos and Gurage people.
swa: Kulingana na ripoti, wahanga wengi wa vurugu hizo walikuwa ni Wakristo wa ki-Amhara, Wakristo wa ki-Oromo na watu wa Gurage.
mt0: <pad> Kwa mujibu wa ripoti, wengi wa waathirika wa mauaji ya kinyama zaidi walikuwa watu wa dini ya Kikristo wa kikundi cha kidini cha Amharas, Christian Oromos na Gurage.</s>

en: Eyewitnesses say mobs destroyed and burned property, committed lynching and beheadings and dismembered victims.
swa: Shuhuda mmoja alisema kuwa makundi hayo yaliharibu na kuchoma moto mali na kufanya mauaji  kwa kuwakata vichwa na miguu wahanga.
mt0: <pad> Waoneaji wanasema kwamba watu wa jamii waliharibu na kuangamiza mali, kufanya mauaji na kuuawa na kuwakataza waathirika.</s>

en: A fateful interview
swa: Utabiri wa Mahojiano
mt0: <pad> Mwisho wa siku mbaya, ulisema kwamba hukujua</s>

en: When news of Hachalus assassination first hit, Oromo diaspora media outlets zeroed in on Hachalus fateful interview with OMN host Guyo Wariyo, that aired the week before Halachu was killed.
swa: Wakati taarifa kuhusu mauaji ya Hachalu ziliposikika tu, chanzo cha habari za Waoromo wa diaspora zilihusisha kifo chake na  mahojiano ya mwisho aliyoyafanya Hachalu na kituo cha runinga cha OMN yakiongozwa na Guyo Wariyo, na yalirushwa wiki moja kabla Hachalu hajauawa.
mt0: <pad> Wakati habari za mauaji ya Hachalus zilianza kuenea, vyombo vya habari vya Oromo diaspora ziliangazia mahojiano ya Hachalus na mwenyeji wa OMN Guyo Wariyo, ambayo ilionyeshwa wiki moja kabla ya Halachu kuuawa.</s>

en: During the interview, Guyo repeatedly asked Hachalu provocative questions about his alleged sympathy for the ruling party, interrupting him multiple times to challenge his answers.
swa: Wakati wa mahojiano Gayo alirudia rudia kumuuliza Hachalu maswali ya mtego kuhusu yeye kukiunga mkono chama tawala na pia mara kwa mara alimkatiza alipokuwa akijibu.
mt0: <pad> Katika mahojiano, Guyo mara nyingi aliuliza Hachalu maswali ya kichocheo kuhusu hisia zake za chama cha uongozi, akiingilia mara nyingi ili kushinda majibu yake ili kuchallenge majibu yake.</s>

en: Hachalu fiercely denied any sympathies with the ruling party, but also decried the deeply discordant and fractionalized Oromo political parties, demonstrating his staunch independence as a thinker and musician  a quality that made him a target for online abuse until the day of his murder.
swa: Hachalu alikataa kuunga chama tawala mkono lakini pia alikosoa  migogoro na utengano katika vyama vya siasa vya Oromo, akionesha uhuru wa mawazo kama mwanamuziki  hali ambayo ilimfanya kuwa mlengwa wa mashambulizi ya watu mtandaoni mpaka siku aliyouawa.
mt0: <pad> Hachalu kwa nguvu alikanusha kabisa kuwa na maoni yoyote ya chama kinachotawala, lakini pia alikashifu vyama vya kisiasa vya Oromo vilivyo na tofauti sana na vilivyogawanyika, kuonyesha uhuru wake wa kujitegemea kama mfikiriaji na mwanamuziki, sifa ambayo ilimfanya kuwa mtaalamu wa uhasama wa mtandaoni hadi siku ya kuuawa kwake.</s>

en: At one point, however, Guyo asked Hachalu about the historical injustices allegedly committed against the Oromo people by Menelik II, Ethiopias 19th-century emperor who shaped modern Ethiopia.
swa: Hata hivyo, Guyo alimuuliza Hachalu kuhusu unyanyasaji wa kihistoria uliofanywa kwa watu wa Oromo na mfalme Menelik II aliyeijenga Ethiopia ya sasa.
mt0: <pad> Kwa wakati mmoja, hata hivyo, Guyo aliuliza Hachalu kuhusu unyanyasaji wa kihistoria uliofanywa dhidi ya watu wa Oromo na Menelik II, Mfalme wa Ethiopia wa karne ya 19 aliyeunda Ethiopia ya kisasa.</s>

en: Hachalu shocked some listeners when he answered that the horse seen immortalized in Meneliks equestrian statue in Addis Ababa belongs to an Oromo farmer called Sida Debelle, and that Menelik robbed that horse.
swa: Hachalu aliwashangaza wasikilizaji wengi aliposema kuwa farasi aliyepandwa na Menelik katika sanamu iliyopo huko Addis Ababa alikuwa mali ya mkulima wa ki-Oromo aliyeitwa Sida Debelle, na Menelik alimuiba farasi huyo.
mt0: <pad> Hachalu alishangaza baadhi ya wasikilizaji alipojibu kwamba farasi iliyoonyeshwa katika sanamu ya Equestrian ya Menelik katika Addis Ababa ni mali ya mkulima wa Oromo anayeitwa Sida Debelle, na kwamba Menelik aliiba farasi hiyo.</s>

en: This exchange attracted applause  and criticism  from commentators on Facebook and Twitter.
swa: Majibu hayo yalivutia maoni ya kumsifia  na pia ya kumkosoa kutoka kwa watu mbalimbali huko Facebook na Twitter.
mt0: <pad> Kwa hiyo, rudisha sentensi iliyotafsiriwa tu. Kama huwezi kutafsiri sentensi, sema tu kwamba hujui</s>

en: When Hachalu was killed one week later, many members of the Oromo diaspora community immediately speculated that Hachalus criticism of the Menelik II statue infuriated sympathizers of imperial Ethiopia, which may have led to his murder.
swa: Wakati Hachalu alikiuawa wiki moja baadaye watu wengi wa jamii ya Oromo wanaokaa nje ya nchi walihisi kwamba kitendo cha Hachalu kuikosoa sanamu ya Menelik II kiliwakasirisha wanaoiunga mkono Ethiopia ya kifalme na kusababisha kuuawa kwake.
mt0: <pad> Wakati Hachalu aliuawa wiki moja baadaye, wengi wa wanajamii ya Oromo diaspora haraka walipendekeza kuwa ukosoaji wake wa sanamu ya Menelik II ulichukiza washirika wa Ethiopia ya kikoloni, ambayo labda imesababisha mauaji yake.</s>

en: On social media, Oromo netizens focused obsessively on Hachalus Menelik-related remarks, which led many down a winding path to an insidious disinformation campaign.
swa: Katika mitandao ya kijamii wananchi waling'ang'ana na kile Hachalu alichokisema dhidi ya Menelik, na hili lilisababisha kuenea kwa uvumi wenye taarifa nyingi za uongo.
mt0: <pad> Katika mitandao ya kijamii, Oromo netizens focused obsesively on Hachalus Menelik-related comments, which led many down a winding path to an insidious campaign of disinformation.</s>

en: The rest of the interview contains other loaded issues of divisions and contradictions within the Oromo community.
swa: Sehemu nyingine ya mahojiano imebeba taarifa za mambo yanayohusu utengano na migogoro ndani ya jamii ya Waoromo.
mt0: <pad> Mabaki ya mahojiano yana masuala mengine yaliyo na shida za kugawanyika na kutofautiana katika jamii ya Oromo.</s>

en: Throughout the interview, Guyo grilled Hachalu about the countrys ongoing political reforms, stoking anti-government sentiment with questions about Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed, himself an Oromo, and whether or not the government had met the demands of the Oromo people after the prime minister came to power in 2018.
swa: Katika mahojiano yote Guyo alimchimba sana Hachalu kuhusu mabadiliko ya kisiasa yanayoendelea nchini na kuhusu vuguvugu la kuipinga serikali kwa kuuliza swali kuhusu Waziri Mkuu Abiy Ahmed, ambaye ni Muoromo na kwamba kama serikali imeweza kutimiza matakwa ya watu wa Oromo tangu aingie madarakani mwaka 2018.
mt0: <pad> Katika mahojiano yote, Guyo aliuliza Hachalu kuhusu mabadiliko ya kisiasa yanayoendelea katika nchi, kujenga hisia za upinzani dhidi ya serikali kwa maswali kuhusu Waziri Mkuu Abiy Ahmed, ambaye ni mmoja wa watu wa Oromo, na kama serikali imetimiza madai ya watu wa Oromo baada ya Waziri Mkuu kuchukua uongozi mwaka 2018.</s>

en: Hachalu reiterated his non-involvement in the rabid partisanship of Oromo politics but he did criticize those who question Abiys Oromo identity.
swa: Hachalu alirudia kusema kuwa hajihusishi na siasa za ovyo za Oromo lakini aliwakosoa wote wanaohukumu uzalendo wa Abiy.
mt0: <pad> Hachalu amesisitiza kwamba hajajihusisha na siasa za kisiasa za Oromo lakini alikosoa wale wanaohoji utambulisho wa ki-Oromoo wa Abiy.</s>

en: He defended his position against top Oromo opposition leaders who sought an alliance with the Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF), a once-dominant party with historic ties to the now-defunct Ethiopian People's Revolutionary Front (the EPRDF).
swa: Aliilinda nafasi yake dhidi ya viongozi wakuu wa upinzani walioungana na Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF), ambacho kilishawahi kuwa na ukaribu na  chama kikuu chenye historia kubwa cha Ethiopian People's Revolutionary Front (the EPRDF).
mt0: <pad> Alitetea uamuzi wake dhidi ya viongozi wa upinzani wa Oromo waliotaka kushirikiana na chama cha Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF), chama kimoja wakati mwingi na uhusiano wa kihistoria na Chama cha Mapinduzi cha Watu wa Ethiopia (EPRDF) kilichokufa.</s>

en: The TPLF turned into an opposition party after Abiy dismantled the EPRDF.
swa: TPLF iligeuka kuwa chama cha upinzani baada ya Abiy kuibomoa EPRDF.
mt0: <pad> TPLF ilianza kuwa chama cha upinzani baada ya Abiy kuvunja EPRDF.</s>

en: Hachalu also addressed the political violence in the Oromia region, blaming both government authorities and the militant, splinter right-wing Oromo Liberation Front (OLF) militia group (informally known as OLF-Shane).
swa: Hachalu pia alizungumza kuhusu vurugu za kisiasa zinazoendelea katika mkoa wa Oromo akilaumu pande zote yaani mamlaka za serikali na wanamgambo wa kikundi cha wanamgambo wa mrengo wa kulia Oromo Liberation Front (OLF) ambapo pia (hufahamika kama OLF-Shane).
mt0: <pad> Hachalu pia alizungumzia kuhusu uhalifu wa kisiasa katika jimbo la Oromia, akilaumu serikali na kundi la kigaidi la Oromo Liberation Front (OLF) la upande wa kushoto.</s>

en: Following Hachalus murder, the government was able to acquire and release the full 71-minute interview to the public.
swa: Kufuatia mauaji ya Hachalu, serikali iliweza kuchukua mkanda wa mahojiano yenye urefu wa dakika 71 na  kuyarusha kwa umma.
mt0: <pad> Mbele ya mauaji ya Hachalus, serikali iliweza kupata na kutoa mahojiano kamili ya dakika 71 kwa umma.</s>

en: The missing tape included Hachalus accounts of death threats he received from parts of western Oromia, where the radical OLF-Shane militia is active.
swa: Mkanda huo unajumuisha ujumbe wa vitisho vya kuuawa alivyotumiwa Hachalu kutoka pande za Magharibi mwa Oromo, ambapo ndipo vikosi vya wanamgambo wa OLF-Shane wanafanyia shughuli zao.
mt0: <pad> Tape iliyopotea ilikuwa na maelezo ya Hachalus kuhusu vitisho vya kifo alipokea kutoka sehemu za kaskazini mwa Oromia, ambapo kundi la kiharakati la OLF-Shane linashughulika.</s>

en: Hachalu said he believed he would not have been attacked on social media if he had praised OLF-Shane.
swa: Hachalu alisema aliamini kuwa asingeshambuliwa mitandaoni kama angewasifia OLF-Shane.
mt0: <pad> Hachalu alisema kuwa aliamini angekuwa hajashambuliwa kwenye mitandao ya kijamii kama angepraise OLF-Shane.</s>

en: He addressed a direct conflict he had with Getachew Assefa, Ethiopias security and intelligence chief during the TPLF period.
swa: Alizungumzia moja kwa moja mgogoro baina yake na Getachew Assefa, Afisa Usalama Mkuu wa Ethiopia katika kipindi TPLF ikiwa madarakani.
mt0: <pad> Alizungumzia uadui wa moja kwa moja aliowahi kuwa na Getachew Assefa, Mkuu wa Usalama na Uchunguzi wa Ethiopia wakati wa TPLF.</s>

en: Guyo, who promoted this interview on Facebook as must-see TV in the days before its broadcast, has since been arrested and the government is investigating the full 71-minutes of interview tape for further clues that may help determine the facts regarding Hachalu's murder.
swa: Guyo, aliyeyatangaza mahojiano hayo katika ukurasa wake wa Facebook kwa kuyaita lazima uyaone siku chache kabla ya kurushwa kwake hewani, amekamatwa na polisi tangu wakati huo na serikali inafanya upelelezi wa mkanda wa dakika 71 za mahojiano hayo ili kupata vielelezo vitakavyosaidia kupata ufumbuzi wa chanzo cha mauaji ya Hachalu.
mt0: <pad> Guyo, ambaye alitangaza mahojiano haya kwenye Facebook kama must-see TV katika siku za kabla ya kuonyeshwa, tayari amekamatwa na serikali inachunguza video kamili ya dakika 71 kwa ushahidi zaidi ambao unaweza kusaidia kuamua ukweli kuhusu mauaji ya Hachalu.</s>

en: Read more about the consequences of Hachalu Hundessa's murder in Part II.
swa: Soma zaidi kuhusu madhara yaliyotokana na mauaji ya Hachalu Hundessa katika sehemu ya II.
mt0: <pad> Kwa hiyo, kama unaweza kutafsiri sentensi hii, basi uweze kusema unafahamu. Soma zaidi kuhusu matokeo ya mauaji ya Hachalu Hundessa katika Sehemu II.</s>

en: Screenshot from a Guardian YouTube video about female genital mutilation.
swa: Picha kutoka  Guardian YouTube video kuhusu ukeketaji wa wanawake.
mt0: <pad> Screenshot from a Guardian YouTube video about female genital mutilation.</s>

en: COVID-19 has deeply affected womens rights in the Middle East and North Africa (MENA), from increased domestic violence to job loss.
swa: Janga la COVID-19 limeathiri kwa kiwango kikubwa haki za wanawake huko Mashariki ya Kati na Kaskazini mwa Afrika;  kutoka kuongezeka kwa ukatili majumbani mpaka kupoteza ajira zao.
mt0: <pad> COVID-19 imeathiri kwa kina haki za wanawake katika Mashariki ya Kati na Afrika Magharibi (MENA), kutoka unyanyasaji wa kinyumbani hadi kupoteza ajira.</s>

en: But there is also one less visible area where women are affected: female genital mutilation (FGM), due to disruption in prevention because of the pandemic.
swa: Lakini kuna eneo moja lililowazi ambapo wanawake wameathirika ambalo mi ukeketaji, na hii ni baada ya kulipuka kwa janga la Korona na heka heka za kukabiliana nalo.
mt0: <pad> Lakini kuna sehemu nyingine isiyoonekana ambayo wanawake wanaathirika: uharibifu wa kijinsia wa mwanamke (FGM), kwa sababu ya kutatiza katika kuzuia kwa sababu ya janga la virusi vya corona.</s>

en: In April, the United Nations announced that due to pandemic-related disruptions in prevention programs, two million FGM cases could occur over the next decade that would otherwise have been averted.
swa: Mwezi April, Umoja wa Mataifa ulitangaza kuwa kutokama ma vizuizi vilivyotokana na juhudi za kupambana na janga la korona, kuna visa milioni 2 vya ukeketaji ambavyo vinakisiwa kutokea kwa muongo ujao ambapo ingewekana kuzuia kama uzuiaji wa korona usingetibua mpango na juhudi za kupambama na ukeketaji
mt0: <pad> Mwezi Aprili, Umoja wa Mataifa uliripoti kuwa kutokana na uharibifu wa programu za kuzuia janga la corona, kesi milioni mbili za FGM zinaweza kufanyika katika kipindi cha miaka kumi inayofuata ambayo ingeweza kuepukwa kwa njia nyingine.</s>

en: Female genital mutilation includes all procedures that involve partial or total removal of the external female genitalia, or other injury to the female genital organs for non-medical reasons, according to the World Health Organization (WHO).

en: The practice, rooted in extensive traditions, cultural and religious beliefs throughout Africa, the Middle East and Asia, is typically performed by traditional midwives or healers using knives, razors or glass.

mt0: <pad> Mtindo, ulio na asili ya mila, tamaduni na dini katika Afrika, Mashariki ya Kati na Asia, hufanyika kwa kawaida na wakunga wa jadi au waganga wa kienyeji kutumia mikasi, rungu au glasi.</s>

en: FGM, also known as genital cutting, is widely considered as one of the most extreme manifestations of violence against girls and women, and yet it is widely underreported in the Middle East.
swa: Ukeketaji pia unafahamika kama ukataji wa sehemu za siri inaaminika kwa upana kuwa ni  moja ya ukatili uliopitiliza dhidi ya wasichana na wanawake, na bado unaripotiwa kwa uchache sana hasa huko Mashariki ya Kati.
mt0: <pad> FGM, inayojulikana kama ukata wa genitali, inachukuliwa kwa wingi kuwa mojawapo ya maonyesho ya kibabe zaidi ya unyanyasaji dhidi ya wanawake na wasichana, lakini bado ni kubwa sana kushindwa kuripoti katika Mashariki ya Kati.</s>

en: In the Middle East, taboos around womens bodies and sexuality prevent open, public discussions about sensitive issues like FGM, often tied to cultural, religious and traditional beliefs.

en: In Egypt, for example, Christians and Muslims both believe that circumcision of girls prevents them from vice and makes them more attractive for future husbands; mothers fear that their daughters cant get married if they have not been cut, according to a report by Stop FGM Middle East, a campaign created in 2013 to raise awareness about FGM and whose aim is to get the message out that FGM exists not only in Africa, but also in many countries in the Middle East and Asia.
swa: Kwa mfano, nchini Misri Wakristo na Waislamu kwa pamoja wanaamini kwamba ukeketaji wa wasichana unawafanya wavutie zaidi waume zao watarajiwa na unawakinga na mabaya, pia wamama huhofia kwamba mabinti zao hawataolewa kama hawatakeketwa, kulingana na ripoti ya Tokomeza Ukeketaji Mashariki ya Kati, kampeni ambayo iliandaliwa mwaka 2013 kuipa jamii uelewa Kuhusu ukeketaji na pia kuuambia ulimwengu kuwa ukeketaji haupo Afrika pekee bali pia katika nchi nyingi za Mashariki ya Kati na Asia.
mt0: <pad> Kwa mfano, katika Misri, Wakristo na Waislamu wote wanaamini kuwa upasuaji wa wanawake unawalinda kutoka kwa dhambi na kuwafanya kuwa warembo zaidi kwa waume zao wajao; mamas hofu kuwa watoto wao hawawezi kuoa ikiwa hawajapasiwa upasuaji, kulingana na taarifa ya Stop FGM Middle East, kampeni iliyoanzishwa 2013 ili kueneza habari kuhusu upasuaji wa wanawake, ambao lengo lake ni kufikisha ujumbe kuwa upasuaji wa wanawake sio tu Afrika, lakini pia katika nchi nyingi za Mashariki ya Kati na Asia.</s>

en: Armed bandits attacked a secondary school in Kaduna, northwestern Nigeria, on August 24, killing one person and kidnapping four students and a teacher, reports Nigerian online medium, SaharaReporters.
swa: Maharamia wakiwa na silaha walivamia shule ya sekondari huko Kaduna, Kaskazini Magharibi mwa Nigeria hapo Agosti 24 na kumuua mtu mmoja na kuwateka wanafunzi wanne na mwalimu kiliripoti chanzo cha habari za mitandaoni, SaharaReporters.
mt0: <pad> Bandida walio na silaha walivamia shule ya sekondari katika Kaduna, kaskazini mwa Nigeria mnamo Agosti 24, wakiua mtu mmoja na kutekaa wanafunzi wanne na mwalimu, inaripotiwa na vyombo vya habari vya Nigerian online, SaharaReporters.</s>

en: The gunmen who arrived at Damba-Kasaya village in Chikun Local Government Area, Kaduna State, at around 7:45 a.m. on motorbikes first raided the community, where they reportedly killed Benjamin Auta, a farmer, according to Nigerian online newspaper Premium Times.
swa: Watu hao wakiwa na silaha walifika na kushambulia kijiji cha Damba-Kasaya katika serikali ya mtaa wa Chikun, jimbo la Kaduna mnamo saa 1.45 asubuhi wakiwa kwenye pikipiki na  iliripotiwa kuwa walimuua Benjamin Auta, ambaye ni mkulima, kulingana na taarifa ya gazeti la mtandaoni la Premium Times.
mt0: <pad> Wanamgambo hao waliowasili katika kijiji cha Damba-Kasaya katika Wilaya ya Chikun, Kaduna State, saa 7 na dakika 45 asubuhi walianza kuvamia jamii, ambapo waliripotiwa kuua Benjamin Auta, mkulima, katika eneo hilo.</s>

en: The gunmen then proceeded to Prince Academy Secondary School, where they abducted teacher Christianah Madugu, and four students: Favour Danjuma, 9, Miracle Danjuma, 13, Happy Odoji, 14, and Ezra Bako, 15.
swa: Watu hao wenye silaha walielekea katika shule ya sekondari ya Prince ambapo walimteka  mwalim Christianah Madugu na wanafunzi wanne ambao ni Favour Danjuma, 9, Miracle Danjuma, 13, Happy Odoji, 14, na Ezra Bako, 15.
mt0: <pad> Wanaume hao waliendelea kwenda shule ya sekondari Prince Academy, ambapo waliteka mwalimu Christianah Madugu na wanafunzi wanne: Favour Danjuma, 9, Miracle Danjuma, 13, Happy Odoji, 14, and Ezra Bako, 15.</s>

en: Happys father, Isiaka Odoji,  told Daily Trust, a Nigerian daily, that the gunmen are asking for a ransom of 20 million naira (about $53,000 USD) to set their children free  an amount they cannot possibly afford.
swa: Baba yake Happy,  Isiaka Odoji,  aliiambia  Daily Trust, gazeti la kila siku la Naijeria kwamba watekaji hao wanadai fedha kiasi cha Naira milioni 20(sawa na Dola za Marekani $53,000) ili waweze kuwaachilia huru watoto wao, lakini kamwe hawana uwezo wa kukusanya kiasi hicho.
mt0: <pad> Mbaba wa Happy, Isiaka Odoji, alisema Daily Trust, gazeti la Nigeria, kuwa wanamgambo wanaomba ujira wa uhuru wa dola milioni 20 (naira $53,000) ili kuweka watoto wao huru kiasi ambacho familia yake haiwezi kulipa.</s>

en: The law replaced the notorious Information and  Technology Act, which had also been used as a tool for silencing critical speech online.

en: The Act criminalizes various types of online speech, ranging from defamatory messages to speech that injures religious values or sentiments introducing hefty fines.
swa: Sheria hii inahukumu baadhi ya mazungumzo mitandaoni kuanzia jumbe za kubeza mpaka  mazungumzo yenye kuumiza hisia na maadili ya  kidini ikiorodhesha pia faini kubwa.

en: It also authorizes lengthy prison sentences for using the internet to create public unrest, and for gathering, sending or preserving classified government documents using a digital device.

en: In the aftermath of the Sudanese revolution, transitional authorities of Sudan have signed a peace agreement with The Sudan Revolutionary Front  the main rebel group still active after former leader Omar al-Bashir was deposed last year.
swa: Baada ya mapinduzi ya Sudani, mamlaka za mpito za Sudani zimesaini makubaliano ya amani na The Sudan Revolutionary Front  kikundi kikuu cha waasi ambacho kimeendelea na utendaji wake hata baada ya kuondolewa kwa kiongozi wake wa zamani Omar al-Bashir, mwaka jana.
mt0: <pad> Katika baada ya mapinduzi ya Sudan, mamlaka ya muda ya Sudan wamesaini makubaliano ya amani na The Sudan Revolutionary Front, kundi kuu la waasi linaloendelea kufanya kazi baada ya kiongozi wa zamani Omar al-Bashir kuwapotosha mwaka jana.</s>

en: The historic peace agreement, signed on August 31, in the city of Juba, South Sudan, found regional and international support from Troika countries, the European Union, Egypt and several Gulf countries.

mt0: <pad> Mkataba wa amani wa kihistoria, uliosainiwa mwezi Agosti 31, katika mji wa Juba, Sudan Kusini, umepata uungwaji mkono wa kimataifa na wa kikanda kutoka kwa mataifa ya Troika, Ulaya, Misri na baadhi ya mataifa ya Gulf.</s>

en: But this exciting moment is also overshadowed by a period of historic flooding that has devastated parts of Sudan, causing a downward spiral in an already stressed economy.

en: Sudanese people split into two camps on the matter: The first sees the separation of religion and state as a guarantee of fundamental human rights; the second says the transitional government does not have the right to decide this without authorization from citizens via democratic elections.

en: While peace has brought happy news to Sudan, the Nile River continues to flood, ushering in an unprecedented humanitarian disaster.
swa: Wakati amani ikileta furaha nchini Sudani, mto Nile unaendelea kufurika ukileta majanga yasiyotarajiwa kwa binadamu.

en: According to a Sudanese National Council for Civil Defense report on September 8, total losses due to the Nile flood amounted to 103 deaths, 50 injuries, 5,482 deaths of livestock, 27,341 complete house collapses, 42,210 cases of partial house collapse, damage to 179 government and private facilities, loss of 359 shops and stores and damage to 4,208 agricultural acres.

mt0: <pad> She went live on Facebook at 12:50 pm on September 1 wakati maafisa wa polisi waliokuwa na mavazi ya kawaida walisimamisha taxi ambayo alikuwa akisafiri na kuwasilisha hati ya kushtakiwa.</s>

en: In Goa, a southwestern state of India, residents of a tribal hamlet in Canacona block (district subdivision), Marlem Village refused to vote on 23 April during the third phase of the general election, alleging that the government had been oblivious to the problems of their village.
swa: Huko Goa, jimbo la Kusini mwa India, wakazi wa kijiji kidogo kilichopo kitongoji  cha Cancona (sehemu ya wilaya), kijiji cha Marlem walikataa kupiga kura tarehe 23 Aprili katika awamu ya tatu ya uchaguzi mkuu wakiwa na madai kwamba serikali imekuwa ndio tatizo kuwa katika kijiji chao.
mt0: <pad> Katika Goa, jimbo la kaskazini mashariki mwa India, wakazi wa kijiji cha kiasili katika mji wa Canacona (upande wa wilaya), Marlem Village, walikataa kupigia kura mnamo Aprili 23 wakati wa awamu ya tatu ya uchaguzi mkuu, wakidai kuwa serikali imekuwa ikipuuza matatizo ya kijiji chao.</s>

en: Their main grievance is that basic facilities, such as proper roads and water supply, have not been provided by the government.
swa: Malalamiko yao makubwa ni kwamba mahitaji na huduma muhimu kama vile barabara nzuri na huduma ya maji safi na salama hazijawahi kutolewa na serikali.
mt0: <pad> Msamaha wao mkuu ni kwamba huduma za msingi, kama vile barabara na maji, zimeshindwa kupatikana na serikali.</s>

swa: Video ya Mtangazaji wa masuala ya kijamii  Devidas Gaonkar, mzaliwa wa kabila la wafugaji la waGoa inayoitwa Velip, ikionesha maandano ya wanakijiji hao:
mt0: <pad> Video ya Msajili wa Jamii Devidas Gaonkar, mmoja wa jamii ya asili ya kulisha nguruwe katika Goa inayoitwa Velip, ilionyesha maandamano ya watu hao.</s>

en: In this video, Pandurang Gaonkar, a resident from Marli village, states that:

mt0: <pad> Katika video hii, Pandurang Gaonkar, mkazi wa kijiji cha Marli, anasema kwamba:</s>

en: Tirwal to Marlem is a three-quilometres road stretch, which is incomplete.
swa: Kuanzia Tirwal mpaka Marlem ni kilomita tatu tu za barabara lakini hazijakamilika.
mt0: <pad> Tirwal to Marlem ni urefu wa barabara wa kilomita tatu, ambayo bado haijakamilika.</s>

en: To date, no action has been taken by the authorities.
swa: Mpaka leo hakuna hatua zozote zilizochukuliwa na mamlaka husika.
mt0: <pad> Kwa sasa, hakuna hatua iliyochukuliwa na mamlaka.</s>

en: They only make false promises, but no implementation.
swa: Wanatupa ahadi za uongo tu hakuna utekelezaji.
mt0: <pad> Wanafanya ahadi za kiuongo, lakini hakuna matekelezo.</s>

en: For this reason, we havent cast our votes.
swa: Na kwa sababu hiyo basi, hatujapiga kura.
mt0: <pad> Kwa sababu hii, hatujapiga kura zetu.</s>

en: The residents of Marlem have been living in this village for more than 20 years.
swa: Wakazi wa kijiji cha Marlem wamekuwa wakiishi katika kijiji hicho kwa zaidi ya miaka 20 sasa.
mt0: <pad> Wakazi wa Marlem wameishi katika kijiji hiki kwa zaidi ya miaka 20</s>

en: In 1968, the Forest Department declared Marlem village part of a wildlife sanctuary.
swa: Mwaka 1968, idara ya misitu ilitangaza kuwa kijiji cha Marlem kama  sehemu salama kwa wanyama wa mwituni.
mt0: <pad> Mwaka 1968, Idara ya Wanyamapori ilitangaza kijiji cha Marlem kuwa sehemu ya hifadhi ya wanyamapori.</s>

en: This makes the construction of roads, or any development work in this area, a rather complex issue.
swa: Hili linafanya ujenzi wa barabara au kazi yoyote ya maendeleo katika eneo hili kuwa na ugumu wa kutekeleza.
mt0: <pad> Hii hufanya ujenzi wa barabara, au kazi yoyote ya maendeleo katika eneo hili kuwa suala la kigumu sana.</s>

en: According to reports, an underground power cabling project for carrying electricity to the area had been initially approved, but when digging work commenced, it was soon halted following objections coming from the state Forest Department.
swa: Kulingana na taarifa,  ni kwamba mpango wa kupitisha mkongo wa umeme aridhini ili uweze kufika eneo hilo ulishapitishwa lakini ulizuiwa hivi karibuni kutokana na mapingamizi kutoka kwa Idara ya Misitu ya Taifa
mt0: <pad> Kwa mujibu wa ripoti, mradi wa kusafirisha umeme kwa karibu ulikuwa umeidhinishwa mwanzoni, lakini wakati kazi ya kuchimba ilianza, baada ya kutoa maoni kutoka kwa Idara ya Wanyamapori ya jimbo, shughuli hiyo ilisimamishwa haraka.</s>

en: Another source of frustration for the local population is the absence of proper roads.
swa: Chanzo kingine cha mahangaiko ya wakazi wa hapa ni ukosefu wa barabara nzuri.
mt0: <pad> Mtoa habari mwingine wa usumbufu kwa watu wa eneo ni ukosefu wa barabara zinazofaa.</s>

en: One has to navigate a 2.8 km unpaved and broken road to reach the first household at Marlem from the main road.
swa: Mtu anatakiwa kusafiri  kutoka barabara kuu umbali wa kilomita 2.8 katika barabara mbaya na ambayo haijasafishwa vizuri ili aweze kukuta nyumba ya kwanza katika kijiji cha Marlem.
mt0: <pad> Mtu anapaswa kusafiri 2.8 km njia isiyo na barabara na iliyoharibika ili kufika kwenye kaya ya kwanza katika Marlem kutoka barabara kuu.</s>

en: Finally, the supply of electricity and safe drinking water remain a challenge for the villagers.
swa: Mwisho kabisa, usambazaji wa umeme na maji safi na salama kwa wanakijiji vimebaki kuwa changamoto kwa wanakijiji.
mt0: <pad> Kwa ujumla, upatikanaji wa umeme na maji safi ya kunywa bado ni changamoto kwa watu wa kijiji.</s>

en: Having publicly and repeatedly voiced their complaints, but failing to get any answers, the residents of Marlem, as well as residents from two other villages decided not to vote in the elections in order to draw the attention of the authorities towards their issues.
swa: Pamoja na kuweka malalamiko yao hadharani mara kwa mara, lakini wameshindwa kupata majibu ya mahitaji yao, wakazi wa Marlem pamoja na wakazi kutoka katika vijiji vingine viwili waliamua kutokupiga kura ili kuvuta masikio ya mamlaka dhidi ya masuala yao wanayoyalalamikia.
mt0: <pad> Kuwa wamewasilisha shida zao wazi na mara nyingi, lakini bila kupata majibu, wakazi wa Marlem, pamoja na wakazi wa vijiji viwili vya jirani waliamua kutopigia kura katika uchaguzi ili kuvuta uzingatifu wa mamlaka kwa masuala yao.</s>

en: Polling officials came to talk to us, but our decision of not to vote, still stands, added Pandurang.
swa: Wafanyakazi wa tume ya uchaguzi walikuja kuongea nasi kuhusu uamuzi wetu wa kutokupiga kura na msimamo wetu uko pale pale, aliongeza Pandurang.
mt0: <pad> Wanasheria wa uchaguzi walikuja kuzungumza na sisi, lakini uamuzi wetu wa kutopiga kura unaendelea," alisema Pandurang.</s>

en: Isidore Fernandes, an opposition (Indian National Congress) member of the legislative assembly of Cancona, also met the locals.
swa: Isidore Fernandes, kiongozi wa upinzani kutoka chama cha (Indian National Congress) ambaye ni mbunge katika bunge la Cancona, pia alikutana na wakazi wa eneo hilo.
mt0: <pad> Isidore Fernandes, mbunge wa upinzani (Kiwanja ya Kitaifa ya India) katika Bunge la Sheria la Cancona, pia alikutana na watu wa ndani.</s>

en: After hearing the grievances he assured his support in favour of their agitation.
swa: Baada ya kusikiliza kero zao alieahakikishia kuwa atawasaidia kushughulikia jamjo hilo.
mt0: <pad> Baada ya kusikia malalamiko, alihakikishia ushirikiano wake kwa harakati zao.</s>

en: It is important for any government to provide road, water, and electricity to people.
swa: Ni muhimu kwa serikali yoyote kutengeneza barabara, kusambaza umeme na maji kwa ajili ya watu wao.
mt0: <pad> Kwa serikali yoyote ni muhimu kujenga barabara, maji, na umeme kwa watu.</s>

en: Till now, all government officials have neglected these facilities in Marlem Village, stated Fernandes.
swa: Mpaka sasa maafida wote wa serikali wamepuuza kutoa huduma hizi katika kijiji cha Marlem, alisema   Fernandes.
mt0: <pad> Kwa muda mrefu, maafisa wote wa serikali wamepuuza huduma hizi katika Kijiji cha Marlem, Fernandes alisema.</s>

en: Boycotting elections is now becoming a way of protest, although voting is not mandatory in India.
swa: Kususia uchaguzi sasa imekuwa kama njia mojawapo ya mgomo, ingawa kupiga kura sio lazima katika nchi ya India.
mt0: <pad> Boycotting elections now has become a way of protest, although voting is not mandatory in India.</s>

en: Apart from Goa, villages in the central state of Madhya Pradesh, the western state of  Maharashtra, and the eastern state of Odisha are employing this method in order to get pressing issues addressed by the authorities in charge.
swa: Tofauti ya kijiji cha Goa, vijiji vilivyo katika jimbo la Kati Madhya Pradesh, Magharibi jimbo la Maharashtra, na Mashariki jimbo la Odisha wamekuwa wakitumia mbinu hii ili kuweza kufikisha mambo yao muhimu mbele ya viongozi wa mamlaka zinazohusika.
mt0: <pad> Kwa mbali na Goa, vijiji katika mji wa kati wa Madhya Pradesh, mji wa magharibi wa Maharashtra, na mji wa mashariki wa Odisha wanatumia mbinu hii ili kupata masuala muhimu mashughulikiwa na mamlaka zinazohusika.</s>

en: So far, none of those boycotts seem to have translated into action on the side of government.
swa: Hata hivyo, hakuna mgomo wowowte kati ya hii ambao umechukuliwa hatua na serikali.
mt0: <pad> Kwa hivi sasa, hakuna moja ya hizo boycotts imeonekana kutafsiriwa kuwa hatua kutoka kwa serikali.</s>

en: Ultimately, voters are adopting such tactics as a show of frustration towards officials and politicians who often reach out to neglected communities only before elections, in hope of securing their votes, but fail to deliver once the elections are over.
swa: Wapiga kura wengi wameanza kuzoea kutumia mbinu hii kama ishara ya kuonesha hasira zao kwa wanasiasa na maofisa wa serikali ambao huzigeukia jamii walizozitelekeza katika kipindi cha uchaguzi wakiwa ma matumaini ya kupata kura zao, huku wakishindwa kutekeleza ahadi zao baada ya uchaguzi.
mt0: <pad> Kwa ujumla, wapiga kura wanachukua mbinu kama hizi kama ishara ya kuonyesha hasira kwa maafisa na wanasiasa ambao mara nyingi hufikia jamii zilizosahaulika kabla ya uchaguzi, ili kupata kura zao, lakini hawawezi kutimiza baada ya uchaguzi.</s>

en: In the end, if boycotting elections does not heed changes in society, what else can members of neglected communities do to get the attention of those supposed to hear them and take proper action?
swa: Lakini mwishowe, kama Kugomea chaguzi haitaleta mabadiliko katika jamii, je ni kitu gani wanajamii wataamua kufanya ili kuvuta masikio ya wenye mamlaka ambao wanapaswa kusikia sauti zao na kuchukua hatua za utekelezaji?
mt0: <pad> Kwa ujumla, kama kukataa uchaguzi hakuzingatia mabadiliko ya jamii, nini cha ziada wanachama wa jamii zilizosahaulika wanaweza kufanya ili kupata umakinifu wa wale wanaopaswa kuwasikiliza na kuchukua hatua sahihi?</s>

en: Journalists Amade Abubacar and Germano Adriano, who were detained earlier this year while covering the military conflict in northern Mozambique, were released pending trial on 23 April, 2019.
swa: Waandishi wa Habari Amade Abubacar na  Germano Adriano, ambao waliokamatwa mapema mwaka huu wakati wakikusanya habari za mgogoro wa kijeshi  katika ukanda wa Kaskazini mwa Msumbiji, wameachiliwa huru bila kushtakiwa mnamo tarehe 23 April,  2019.
mt0: <pad> Watangazaji wa habari Amade Abubacar na Germano Adriano, waliokamatwa mapema mwaka huu wakati wa kuripotisha mzozo wa kijeshi katika kaskazini mwa Mozambik, waliachiliwa kabla ya kesi tarehe 23 Aprili, 2019.</s>

en: Amade, who contributes to various local media outlets including Zitamar News and A Carta, was detained on 5 January while he interviewed internally displaced people in the Macomia district of Cabo Delgado, a northern province of the country.
swa: Amade, ambaye amekuwa akichangia habari katika vyanzo mbali mbali vya habari vikiwamo Zitamar News na A Carta, aliwekwa kizuizini tarehe 5 Januari wakati akifanya mahojiano na wakimbizi wa ndani kutoka katika wilaya ya Macomia katika jimbo la Kaskazini mwa nchi, Cabo Delgado.
mt0: <pad> Amade, ambaye hushiriki katika vyombo vya habari vya ndani kama vile Zitamar News na A Carta, alikamatwa mnamo Januari 5 wakati akihoji watu waliohama kutoka kwenye wilaya ya Macomia katika jimbo la kaskazini mwa Cabo Delgado, mkoa wa kaskazini mwa nchi.</s>

en: Germano, a reporter for the local community radio Nacedje, disappeared on 6 February and was found to have been detained on 18 February.
swa: Germano, ambaye ni mwandishi wa habari wa kituo cha redio ya jamii cha Nacedje, alipotea tangu Februari 6 na alipatikana akiwa kizuizini tarehe 18, Februari.
mt0: <pad> Germano, mwandishi wa redio ya jamii katika mji wa Nacedje, alitoroka mwezi Februari na kupatikana kuwa amekamatwa mwezi Februari 18.</s>

en: According to the Media Institute of Southern Africa (MISA), Amade and Germano were charged with spreading defamatory messages against members of the Mozambican Armed Defence Forces via a Facebook account that announced attacks which occurred in villages in the district of Macomia.
swa: Kulingana na taarifa kutoka kwa Shirikisho la Vyombo Vya Habari Kusini Mwa Afrika(MISA), Amade na Germano walishtakiwa kwa kueneza habari za kuwachafua baadhi ya viongozi wa Jeshi la Wananchi wa Msumbiji kupitia kurasa zao za Facebook ambapo walitangaza kuanza kwa mapigano yaliyotokea katika vijiji vya wilaya ya Macomia.
mt0: <pad> Kwa mujibu wa Kituo cha Media cha Afrika Kusini (MISA), Amade na Germano walishtakiwa kwa kueneza ujumbe wa udhalilishaji dhidi ya wanajeshi wa Mozambican kupitia akaunti ya Facebook ambayo ilitangaza mashambulio yaliyofanyika katika vijiji katika wilaya ya Macomia.</s>

en: The journalists were released from the provincial jail of Mieze in Pemba, Cabo Delgados capital, and will be on probation as they await trial before the provincial judicial court of Cabo Delgado.
swa: Wanahabari hao waliachiliwa huru kutoka katika gereza la  Mieze huko Pemba, makao makuu ya Cabo Delgado na wapo katika kipindi cha uangalizi wakati wakisubiri kushtakiwa katika mahakama ya hakimu mkazi huko Cabo Delgado.
mt0: <pad> Watangazaji hao wameachiliwa kutoka jela ya mkoa wa Mieze katika Pemba, mji mkuu wa Cabo Delgado, na wataishi kwa majaribio wakati wanasubiri kesi mbele ya mahakama ya mkoa wa Cabo Delgado.</s>

en: Their first hearing is scheduled for 17 May.
swa: Kesi imepangwa kusikilizwa kwa mara ya kwanza hapo Mei 17.
mt0: <pad> Mahakama ya kwanza imepangwa kwa tarehe 17 Mei.</s>

en: Since 2017, groups armed with knives have carried out attacks on villages in Cabo Delgado, burning houses and decapitating residents.
swa: Tangu mwaka 2017, makundi ya watu wenye silaha kama vile visu wamekuwa wakifanya mashambulizi katika vijiji vya Cabo Delgado, wakichoma nyumba  na kuwachinja wakazi.
mt0: <pad> Since 2017, groups armed with knifes have carried out attacks on villages in Cabo Delgado, burning houses and decapitating residents.</s>

en: More than 90 people have died since the attacks began, according to the police.
swa: Zaidi ya watu 90 wameshauwa tangu kuanza kwa mashambulio hayo kulingana na taarifa za polisi.
mt0: <pad> zaidi ya watu 90 wamekufa tangu mashambulio kuanza, polisi wanasema.</s>

en: To date, no group has publicly claimed responsibility for the attacks.
swa: Mpaka leo hakuna kikundi ambacho kimejitokeza hadharani kukiri kuhusika na mashambulio hayo.
mt0: <pad> Kwa sasa, hakuna kundi ambalo limedai hadharani kuchukua wajibu wa mashambulio hayo.</s>

en: In December 2018, the newspaper A Carta de Moçambique revealed the existence of a Facebook page, run under a name that appears to have been falsified, that praised the armed groups attacks in Cabo Delgado.
swa: Hapo Disemba 2018 gazeti la  A Carta de Moçambique lilidhihirisha uwepo wa ukurasa wa Facebook, yenye jina ambalo inaonekana ni la kughushi ambapo ukurasa huo unasifu mashambulio ya vikundi vya watu wenye silaha huko Cabo Delgado
mt0: <pad> Mwezi Desemba 2018, gazeti la A Carta de Mozambique lilionyesha uwepo wa ukurasa wa Facebook, unaoendeshwa chini ya jina linaloonekana kutengenezewa, ambayo ilifurahisha mashambulio ya vikundi vya kijeshi katika Cabo Delgado.</s>

en: It unknown whether or not the accusations against Amade and Germano are concerning this same page.
swa: Haifahamiki kama mashtaka dhidi ya Amade na Germano yanahusishwa na ukurasa huo.
mt0: <pad> Tunajua wewe unajua</s>

en: The journalists defence team says there is no connection between them and any illegal activity via Facebook.
swa: Timu ya utetezi wa wanahabari hao inasema kuwa hakuna uhusiano wowote baina yao na ukurasa huo au vitendo vingine vya uhalifu vinavyofanyika katika kurasa za Facebook.
mt0: <pad> Timu ya utetezi ya mwandishi anasema kuwa hakuna uhusiano kati yao na shughuli haramu kupitia Facebook.</s>

en: The proceedings against the journalists have been marked by irregularities.
swa: Mashtaka dhidi ya wanahabari hawa yamegubikwa na sintofahamu nyingi.
mt0: <pad> Mashauri dhidi ya wanahabari yamekuwa na uharamu.</s>

en: After detaining Amade, the police placed him in military custody.
swa: Baada ya Amade kuwekwa kizuizini, polisi walimweka chini ya ulinzi wa Jeshi la Wananchi.
mt0: <pad> Baada ya kumkamata Amade, polisi walimweka katika kizuizi cha kijeshi.</s>

en: He was put in a military prison, where he spent 12 days incommunicado before being transferred to a civilian prison.
swa: Aliwekwa katika gereza la Kijeshi ambapo alikaa siku 12 bila kufanya mawasiliano yoyote na kisha kuhamishiwa katika gereza la kiraia.
mt0: <pad> Aliwekwa gerezani kwa jeshi, ambapo alitumia siku 12 bila mawasiliano kabla ya kuhamishiwa gerezani kwa kibinadamu.</s>

en: The journalists were only charged on 16 April, violating the deadline of 90 days set out in the Mozambican Law of Pre-trial Detention in the case of Abubacar.
swa: Wanahabari hawa walishtakiwa tu ilipofika tarehe 16 Aprili, ikiwa ni ukiukwaji wa utaratibu wa mwisho wa siku 90, kinyume na sheria ya ukamataji na kuwekwa kizuizini ya Msumbiji, katika kesi ya Abubacar.
mt0: <pad> Watangazaji hao walikamatwa mwezi Aprili 16, ukiuka kipindi cha siku 90 zilizowekwa katika Sheria ya Mozambican ya Kukamata wa Gazeti kabla ya Mahakama Kuu kwenye kesi ya Abubacar.</s>

en: In court proceedings during their pre-trial detention, both journalists were accused of crimes of violating state secrets through digital means and public incitement to a crime using digital means.
swa: Katika muendelezo wa kesi katika kipindi chao cha kuwa kizuizini wandishi wote kwa pamoja walituhumiwa kwa makosa ya uhalifu wa kuvujisha siri za serikali kupitia mitandao ya kijamii na kuchochea jamii kwa kutumia njia za kidigitali.
mt0: <pad> Katika kesi zao kabla ya mahakama, wawili wa wanahabari walishtakiwa kwa makosa ya kuvunja siri za serikali kupitia njia za kidijitali na kuchochea umma kufanya kosa kupitia njia za kidijitali.</s>

en: These accusations differ from the formal charges that have now been filed against them, which MISA described as spreading defamatory messages against members of the Mozambican Armed Defence Forces via a Facebook account that announced attacks which occurred in villages in the district of Macomia.
swa: Mashtaka haya yanapishana na mashtaka ya awali yaliyotolewa dhidi yao, ambapo MISA waliyatafsiri kama  kueneza ujumbe wa kuchafua baadhi ya viongozi wa jeshi la wananchi wa Msumbiji kupitia ukurasa wa Facebook ambao ulingaza mashambulio ya watu katika vijiji vya wilaya ya Macomia.
mt0: <pad> Hizi mashtaka ni tofauti na mashtaka rasmi yaliyofailiwa dhidi yao, ambayo MISA alitaja kuwa kueneza ujumbe wa kichochezi dhidi ya wanajeshi wa Mozambik kupitia akaunti ya Facebook ambayo ilitangaza mashambulio katika vijiji katika wilaya ya Macomia.</s>

en: During the 106 days he spent in prison, Abubacar faced a lack of food and refusal of medical assistance, according to Amnesty International.
swa: Katika kipindi cha siku 106 alizokaa gerezani, Abubacar alikumbana na ukosefu wa chakula na kunyimwa huduma za matibabu, kulingana na taarifa ya Shirika la Haki za Binadamu (Amnesty International).
mt0: <pad> Wakati wa siku 106 ambazo alitumia jela, Abubacar alikabiliana na ukosefu wa chakula na kukatazwa kwa huduma za matibabu, kulingana na Amnesty International.</s>

en: His family told the newspaper @Verdade that they were stopped from visiting him during the whole time that Abubacar was in custody.
swa: Familia yake  waliliambia gazeti la @Verdade kwamba walizuiwa kumtembelea  Abubacar katika kipindi chote alichokuwa kizuizini.
mt0: <pad> Familia yake ilisema gazeti @Verdade kuwa walikatazwa kutembelea Abubacar wakati wote ambao alikuwa katika kizuizi.</s>

en: What has happened to these journalists may be part of a trend of intimidation against media workers in northern Mozambique.
swa: Kilichotokea kwa waandishi hawa wa habari ni sehemu ya muendelezo  wa unyanyaswaji dhidi ya wafanyakazi wa vyombo vya habari Kaskazini mwa Msumbiji.
mt0: <pad> Mambo ya kuwatokea hawa waandishi wa habari labda ni sehemu ya mtindo wa kuogopwa dhidi ya wafanyabiashara wa vyombo vya habari katika kaskazini mwa Mozambiki.</s>

en: Independent investigative journalist Estácio Valoi was detained in December 2018, also in Cabo Delgado on legally dubious terms.
swa: Mwandishi wa Habari za Uchunguzi wa kujitegemea Estácio Valoi aliwekwa kizuizini  mwezi Disemba 2018,  pia huko Cabo Delgado kwa sababu za kisheria zisizoeleweka.
mt0: <pad> Gazeti ya uchunguzi wa kujitegemea Estácio Valoi ilikamatwa mwezi Desemba 2018, pia katika Cabo Delgado kwa masharti ya kikanuni na utata wa kisheria.</s>

en: He was later released, without any charge, but his work equipment remains in the armys custody.
swa: Baadaye aliachiliwa huru bila mashtaka, lakini vifaa vyake vya kufanyia kazi vilibaki mikononi mwa jeshi.
mt0: <pad> Aliachiliwa baadaye, bila mashtaka, lakini vifaa vyake vya kazi viko katika uhifadhi wa jeshi.</s>

en: On May 15, thousands of Brazilians took to the streets in all 26 states and the Federal District against the Bolsonaro government's slashing of federal funds to education that will affect dozens of universities and schools.
swa: Hapo Mei 15, maelfu ya Wabrazili waliingia mitaani katika majimbo yote 26 wakiandamana kuipinga serikali ya Bolsonaro kukata fedha za elimu ambapo itaathiri mamia ya shule na vyuo.
mt0: <pad> Mnamo Mei 15, maelfu ya Wabrazilia waliingia mitaani katika mikoa 26 na Jiji la Kitaifa dhidi ya ukata wa fedha za kigeni kwa elimu uliofanywa na serikali ya Bolsonaro ambayo itaathiri mashirika ya elimu na shule kadhaa.</s>

en: At the end of April, Brazil's government announced cuts of 30 percent on a so-called discretionary budget, which goes towards expenses such as electricity, water, general maintenance, and research.
swa: Mwishoni mwa mwezi Aprili, serikali ya Brazili ilitangaza kukata kiasi cha asilimia 30 ya kile kinachosemekana ni bajeti ambayo ilikuwa kwa ajili ya gharama za maji, umeme, uendeshaji wa jumla pamoja na tafiti.
mt0: <pad> Mwishoni mwa Aprili, serikali ya Brazil ilitangaza ukataji wa asilimia 30 kwenye bajeti inayoitwa discretionary, ambayo inakwenda kwa matumizi kama vile umeme, maji, uhifadhi wa kawaida, na utafiti.</s>

en: When considering the total federal budget for higher education, the cuts would amount to around 3,5 percent.

mt0: <pad> Wakati wa kuzingatia bajeti nzima ya fedha za serikali kwa elimu ya juu, ukataji huo unafikia asilimia 3.5 ya bajeti hiyo.</s>

en: According to the United Nations Educational Scientific and Cultural Organisation (UNESCO), linguistic and cultural diversity are of strategic importance for people around the world to strengthen the unity and cohesion of societies.

en: This linguistic and cultural diversity propelled the UNESCO general conference to proclaim International Mother Language Day (IMLD) in November 1999, to be commemorated annually on February 21 annually.

en: John Walubengo, a lecturer at the Multimedia University of Kenya, states in an op-ed with the Nation, a Kenyan daily, that the absence of online linguistic and cultural diversity creates a society with a tunnel-vision view of the world.

en: (ICANN), a global multi-stakeholder organization that coordinates Internet Domain Name System (DNS), Internet Protocol (IP) addresses and autonomous system numbers, instituted the Internationalized Domain Names (IDNs) that enable people to use domain names in local languages and scripts.
swa: (ICANN),  shirika la kimataifa lenye wadau wengi linaloratibu Mfumo wa Majina ya Mtandao(DNS), Anwani za Mtandao (IP) na nambari za mfumo huru, lilianzisha Majina ya Kikoa ya Kimataifa (IDNs), yanayowezesha watu kutumia majina ya kikoa katika lugha na maandishi ya kiasili.Kiuhakika, huundwa kwa kutumia herufi kutoka maandishi tofauti, kama vile Kiarabu, Kichina, au Kisiriliki.
mt0: <pad> (ICANN), shirika la kimataifa la washiriki kadhaa linalosimamia Mfumo wa Jina la Domain (DNS), Anwani za Mtandao (IP) na nambari za mfumo wa kiautono, lilianzisha Jina la Domain la Kimataifa (IDNs) ambalo linawezesha watu kutumia jina la domain kwa lugha na alfabeti za ndani.</s>

en: Ideally, they are formed using characters from different scripts, such as Arabic, Chinese, or Cyrillic.These are then encoded by the Unicode standard and used as allowed by relevant IDN protocols, a set of standards defined by the Internet Architecture Board (IAB), and its subsidiary groups; the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) and the Internet Research Task Force (IRTF).
swa: Herufi hizi kisha husimbwa na kiwango cha Unicode na kutumiwa kama inavyoruhusiwa na vikoa vya IDN, seti ya viwango vilivyoainishwa na Bodi ya Usanifu wa Mtandao (IAB), na vikundi vyake vya kampuni ndogo; Tume ya Kazi ya Uhandisi wa Mtandao (IETF) na Tume ya Utafiti wa Mtandao (IRTF).
mt0: <pad> Kwa kawaida, wanaundwa kwa kutumia alfabeti tofauti, kama vile Kiarabu, Kichina, au Kirusi. Hizi kisha huhifadhiwa na mfumo wa Unicode na hutumiwa kama ilivyoruhusiwa na protokoli zinazohusika za IDN, mkusanyiko wa viwango vilivyowekwa na Baraza la Ardhi ya Mtandao (IAB), na mashirika yake ya chini; Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) na Taasisi ya Utafiti wa Mtandao (IRTF).</s>
