en: In the early morning of November 15, 2017, Zimbabweans woke up to the news that former strongman, the late Robert Mugabe, had been deposed in a coup d'etat, and was under house arrest with his family at the presidential residence, State House.
swa: Mapema asubuhi ya Novemba 15, 2017, raia wa Zimbabwe waliamka na habari zilizoenea kwamba aliyekuwa mbabe, marehemu Robert Mugabe, alikuwa amengolewa madarakani katika mapinduzi ya serikali, na alikuwa nguvuni kwenye makazi yake, Ikulu, pamoja na familia yake.
mt0: <pad> Katika asubuhi ya mapema mwezi wa Novemba 15, 2017, Zimbabweans waliamka na taarifa kuwa aliyekuwa mwanasiasa mwenye nguvu, Robert Mugabe, alikuwa ameondolewa katika uasi, na alikuwa chini ya kizuizini nyumbani na familia yake katika makazi ya rais, State House.</s>

en: Major General Sibusiso Moyo, now foreign affairs minister, announced on state television that the president was safe under state custody and that the situation has moved to another level.
swa: Meja Jenerali Sibusiso Moyo, ambaye kwa sasa ni waziri wa mambo ya nje, alitangaza kwenye runinga ya taifa kuwa rais huyo alikuwa salama chini ya ulinzi wa serikali na kwamba hali ya mambo iko katika ngazi nyingine.
mt0: <pad> Major General Sibusiso Moyo, ambaye sasa ni Waziri wa Mambo ya Nje, alitangaza kwenye televisheni ya taifa kuwa Rais alikuwa salama katika uhifadhi wa taifa na kwamba hali imesonga kwa kiwango kingine.</s>

en: Almost immediately following General Moyos announcement, Zimbabweans fervently took to social media  in particular, WhatsApp, Twitter and Facebook  to get updates on the situation.
swa: Mara tu baada ya tangazo hilo la Jenerali Moyo, raia wa Zimbabwe walimiminika kwa msisimko mkubwa kwenye mitandao ya kijamii  hasa WhatsApp, Twitter na Facebook  ili kupata taarifa mpya kuhusu hali hiyo.
mt0: <pad> Kwa karibu mara moja baada ya taarifa ya General Moyo, Wazimbabwe walichukua kwa bidii mitandao ya kijamii haswa WhatsApp, Twitter na Facebook ili kupata maelezo juu ya hali.</s>

en: This newfound popularity of social media to access information and mobilise protests took root for the first time among Zimbabweans, when protesters took to the streets and helped push Mugabe out of office.
swa: Kwa mara ya kwanza, umaarufu mpya wa mitandao ya kijamii kuwezesha kupata habari na kuhamasisha maandamano ulimea mizizi miongoni mwa raia wa Zimbabwe, wakati waandamanaji walipoingia mitaani na kusaidia kushinikiza kuondolewa kwa Mugabe madarakani.
mt0: <pad> Hii utumiaji mpya wa mitandao ya kijamii kupata habari na kumobilize maandamano ilichukua mzizi kwa mara ya kwanza miongoni mwa Wazimbabwe, wakati waandamanaji waliingia barabarani na kusaidia kumsukuma Mugabe kutoka uongozini.</s>

en: The new government, led by Emmerson Dambudzo Mnangagwa, took notice of social medias power.
swa: Serikali mpya, iliyoongozwa na Emmerson Dambudzo Mnangagwa,ilingamua mara nguvu ya  mitandao ya kijamii.
mt0: <pad> Mkuu wa serikali mpya, Emmerson Dambudzo Mnangagwa, alitambua nguvu ya mitandao ya kijamii.</s>

en: As a former state security minister, Mnangagwa also appreciated the importance and value of disinformation in Zimbabwes political terrain.
swa: Kama waziri wa zamani wa usalama wa nchi, Mnangagwa pia alitambua umuhimu na nafasi ya  upotoshaji taarifa katika nyanja za kisiasa za Zimbabwe.
mt0: <pad> Kama Waziri wa Usalama wa Kitaifa aliyekuwa, Mnangagwa pia alitambua umuhimu na thamani ya udanganyifu katika mazingira ya kisiasa ya Zimbabwe.</s>

en: In a calculated move to consolidate newfound political power and ensure an electoral victory during the presidential and legislative elections scheduled for next year, Mnangagwa instructed his ruling ZANU PF (Zimbabwe African National Union-Patriotic Front) party youth league to enter the social media and online firmament and batter the opponent, back in March 2018.
swa: Mnamo mwezi Machi, 2018, kwa kutambua mara na ili kujitwalia mamlaka ya kisiasa yaliyojianika mbele yake na ili kuhakikisha ushindi katika uchaguzi wa rais na wabunge katika mwaka uliofuatia, Mnangagwa aliamuru umoja wa vijana wa chama tawala cha  ZANU PF (Zimbabwe National Union-Patriotic Front) kujimwaga katika mitandao ya kijamii na mtandaoni na kuwachafua na kuwashambulia wapinzani.
mt0: <pad> Katika mpango wa kuzingatia ili kuhakikisha ushindi wa kisiasa wakati wa uchaguzi wa rais na wabunge uliopangwa kwa mwaka ujao, Mnangagwa aliamuru chama cha ZANU PF (Zimbabwe African National Union-Patriotic Front) cha uongozi kuingia kwenye mitandao ya kijamii na online na kuwashambulia wapinzani wake, mwezi Machi 2018.</s>

en: In post-Mugabe Zimbabwe, this has exacerbated a mis- and disinformation crisis, leaving Zimbabweans with few credible and accurate sources of information to stay informed about the countrys transition and and anti-government protests.
swa: Katika Zimbabwe baada ya Mugabe, mpango wake huu umeimarisha mgogoro wa upotoshaji na utoaji taarifa zisizo za kweli, na hivyo kuwaacha Wazimbabwe na vyanzo vichache tu vya kuaminika vya kupata habari na kujua kuhusu yanayoendelea katika kipindi cha mpito na maandamano ya kupinga serikali.
mt0: <pad> Katika Zimbabwe ya baada ya Mugabe, hii imeongeza mzozo wa ufahamu na uongo, kuwaacha Wazimbabwe na vyanzo chache vya habari za kuaminika na sahihi ili kujifunza kuhusu mabadiliko ya nchi na maandamano dhidi ya serikali.</s>

en: While the new government decried fake news pertaining to any news circulated on social media that they perceived to threaten the countrys status quo, it also deployed tactics aimed at misleading the public about its handling of anti-government protests.
swa: Wakati ambapo serikali mpya ilijidai kulaani habari za uongo  kwa taarifa zilizosambazwa kwenye mitandao ya kijamii na ambazo waliziona kuwa tishio utawala ulio madarakani,  pia ilifanya hila ilikuupotosha umma kuhusu namna ilivyoshughulika na maandamano ya kuipinga serikali.
mt0: <pad> Wakati serikali mpya ililaumu habari za uongo zinazohusu habari zilizosambazwa kwenye mitandao ya kijamii ambazo walidhania zilitishia hali ya nchi, ilitumia mbinu za kudanganya umma kuhusu jinsi ya kushughulikia maandamano dhidi ya serikali.</s>

en: Zimbabwe has witnessed a significant rise in mobile internet and social media usage over the past few years.
swa: Zimbabwe imeshuhudia ongezeko kubwa la matumizi ya intaneti kwenye simu za mkononi na mitandao ya kijamii katika miaka michache iliyopita.
mt0: <pad> Zimbabwe imeona ongezeko la kutumia mtandao wa simu na mitandao ya kijamii kwa miaka michache iliyopita.</s>

en: The internet penetration rate increased by 41.1 percent, from 11 percent of the population to 52.1 percent between 2010 and 2018, while mobile phone penetration increased by 43.8 percent from 58.8 percent to 102.7 percent over the same period.
swa: Kiwango cha kuenea kwa intaneti kiliongezeka kwa asilimia 41.1, kutoka asilimia 11 ya idadi ya watu hadi asilimia 52.1 kati ya 2010 na 2018, wakati kuenea kwa simu za mkononi kuliongezeka kwa asilimia 43.8 kutoka asilimia 58.8 hadi asilimia 102.7 kwa kipindi hicho hicho.
mt0: <pad> Kwa ujumla, kiwango cha kutumia intaneti kimeongezeka kwa asilimia 41,1 kutoka 11 % ya watu hadi 52.1 % kati ya mwaka wa 2010 na 2018, wakati mtandao wa simu za mkononi umeongezeka kwa asilimia 43.8 kutoka 58.8 % hadi 102.7 % katika kipindi sawa.</s>

en: This means that half the population is now connected to the internet, compared to only 11 percent in 2010.
swa: Hii inamaanisha kuwa nusu ya idadi ya watu sasa imeunganishwa na intaneti, ikilinganishwa na asilimia 11 tu katika mwaka 2010.

en: However, mis- and disinformation have found fertile ground to flourish owing to a variety of factors: extreme polarisation in the media, proposed government controls over social media, poor official communication methods and low digital literacy among internet users.

en: Media control in Zimbabwe bears its origins in colonial policies of the 20th century, which were tainted with violent subjugation to political authority.

en: The Ian Smith-led Rhodesian government valued propaganda and centralised information control as a weapon of choice, not only to endorse the regimes believed legitimacy but to spread disinformation about the war.

en: The colonial government passed a plethora of laws to suppress free expression or dissent against Smiths racist policies and they brutally enforced these laws to target liberation leaders.

en: Information blockades were the norm even before independence in 1980, and this set the government's tone in terms of communication policies and media management for years to come.

en: The same day, President Museveni told journalists that he ordered the blocking of social media: Steps must be taken for security to stop so many getting in trouble, it is temporary because some people use those pathways for telling lies, he said.

mt0: <pad> Mchana huo huo, Rais Museveni aliwaambia wanahabari kuwa ameamuru kufungwa kwa mitandao ya kijamii: Hatua lazima zichukuliwe kwa usalama ili kuzuia watu wengi kuingia katika matatizo, ni muda mfupi kwa sababu baadhi ya watu hutumia njia hizo kusema uongo, alisema.</s>

en: On March 17, in an official declaration during Supreme Court deliberations in which President Musevenis 2016 victory was challenged, the UCC executive director Godfrey Mutabazi explained that he received instructions from the Inspector General of Police, Kale Kayihura, to shut down social media networking sites and mobile money facilities owing to security concerns.
swa: Mnamo Machi 17, katika tamko rasmi wakati wa maamuzi ya Mahakama Kuu ambako ushindi wa Rais Museveni ulipingwa, mkurugenzi mtendaji wa UCC, Godfrey Mutabazi alielezea kwamba alipokea maagizo kutoka kwa Inspekta Jenerali wa Polisi, Kale Kayihura, kufunga tovuti za mitandao ya kijamii na huduma za kutuma pesa kwa njia ya simu kwa sababu za kiusalama.
mt0: <pad> Mwezi Machi 17, katika maelezo rasmi wakati wa mashauri ya Mahakama Kuu ambapo ushindi wa Rais Museveni 2016 ulikataliwa, mkurugenzi mtendaji wa UCC Godfrey Mutabazi alieleza kuwa amepokea maagizo kutoka kwa Inspekta Jenerali wa Polisi Kale Kayihura kufunga mitandao ya kijamii na huduma za fedha za simu kwa sababu ya wasiwasi wa usalama.</s>

en: These shutdowns interfered with the rights and daily lives of Ugandans who use the internet and social media platforms to access information, express views and conduct everyday business online.
swa: Kufungwa huku kuliingilia haki na maisha ya kila siku ya Waganda wanaotumia mtandao na majukwa ya mitandao ya kijamii kupata habari, kuelezea maoni na kufanya biashara zao za kila siku.
mt0: <pad> Shutdowns hizi zimeathiri haki na maisha ya kila siku ya Waganda wanaotumia mitandao ya kijamii na platform za mtandao kupata habari, kuonyesha maoni na kufanya biashara ya kila siku mtandaoni.</s>

en: During the weeks prior to the 2016 elections, Ugandans actively tweeted and debated about the elections using hashtags like #UgandaDecides and #UGDebate16.
swa: Majuma kabla ya uchaguzi wa 2016, Waganda walijitolea sana kuchapisha na kujadili kuhusu uchaguzi huo kwa kutumia kibwagizo cha #UgandaDecides na # UGDebate16.
mt0: <pad> Katika wiki kabla ya uchaguzi wa 2016, Waganda walitumia vizuri hashtags kama #UgandaDecides na #UGDebate16 kujadili kuhusu uchaguzi.</s>

en: Ugandan citizens level of online civic engagement was sparked by the first-ever televised presidential debates, the first of which was held in January and the second, a week later.
swa: Kiwango cha Waganda cha ushiriki wa raia kwenye mtandao kilichochewa na midahalo ya rais ya kwanza  kabisa kuwahi kurushwa na runinga, wa kwanza ambao ulifanyika mnamo Januari na wa pili, wiki moja baadaye.
mt0: <pad> Ugandans' level of online civic engagement was sparked by the first televised presidential debates, the first which was held in January and the second, a week later.</s>

en: Even with the social media bans in place, many Ugandans continued to post about the elections using Virtual Private Networks or VPNs.
swa: Licha ya ufungwaji wa mitandao ya kijamii, Waganda wengi waliendelea kutuma taarifa kuhusu uchaguzi kwa kutumia anwani ya mtandao binafsi inayofahamika kama VPN.
mt0: <pad> Hata katika hali ya kukataza mitandao ya kijamii, Waganda kadhaa waliendelea kuweka maudhui kuhusu uchaguzi kwa kutumia Mtandao wa Kibinafsi wa Virtual au VPNs.</s>

en: On election day, citizens were able to share updates on late arrivals of voting materials at various stations, reports of election malpractice, and provisional election results on social media.
swa: Siku ya uchaguzi, raia waliweza kushiriki yaliyokuwa yanajiri kuhusu kucheleweshwa kwa vifaa vya kupiga kura katika vituo mbali mbali, visa vya udanganyifu katika uchaguzi, na matokeo ya muda ya uchanguzi kwenye mitandao ya kijamii.
mt0: <pad> Katika siku ya uchaguzi, raia waliweza kushiriki maelezo kuhusu usafiri wa vifaa vya kupigia kura kwa vituo tofauti, taarifa za uharibifu wa uchaguzi, na matokeo ya msingi ya uchaguzi kwenye mitandao ya kijamii.</s>

en: Human rights activists say that targeted shutdowns during election periods slow down communication, just when access to information and citizen expression are most needed.
swa: Wanaharakati wa haki za binadamu wanasema kwamba ufungwaji wa kimkakati wakati wa uchaguzi hupunguza kasi ya mawasiliano, wakati tu upatikanaji wa habari na usemi wa raia unahitajika sana.
mt0: <pad> Watetea haki za binadamu wanasema kwamba kufungwa kwa njia ya kisiasa wakati wa uchaguzi hupunguza mawasiliano, just when access to information and the expression of citizens are most needed.</s>

en: Internet shutdowns limit people from communicating particular concerns that affect them, such as health, interaction with friends as well sharing of political views and opinions, Moses Owiny, the chief executive of the Center for Multilateral Affairs, an independent platform for policy analysis operating in Uganda and Tanzania, told Global Voices in an interview.
swa: Kufungwa kwa mtandao kunazuia watu kuzungumzia mambo fulani yanayowaathiri, kama vile afya, mwingiliano na marafiki na pia kubadilishana maoni ya kisiasa, Moses Owiny, afisa mkuu wa the Center for Multilateral Affairs, jukwaa huru la uchambuzi wa sera linalofanya shughuli nchini Uganda na Tanzania, aliiambia  Global Voices katika mahojiano.
mt0: <pad> Mkatazaji wa intaneti unazuia watu kuzungumza masuala maalum ambayo yanawaathiri, kama vile afya, mazungumzo na marafiki, pamoja na kushiriki maoni na maoni ya kisiasa, Moses Owiny, mkurugenzi mkuu wa Kituo cha Mashauri ya Kitaifa, alisema Global Voices katika mahojiano.</s>

en: According to Owiny, shutdowns primarily aim to stop dissent in politics based on perceived fear by the state that citizens views and concerns are likely to incite the public, an accusation he believes is unfounded and not grounded in reality but assumptions.
swa: Kwa mujibu wa Owiny, ufungwaji hukusudia kuzuia upinzani katika siasa kwa misingi ya hofu ya serikali kwamba maoni ya raia yanaweza kuchochea umma, madai ambayo anaamini hayana msingi kiuhakika ila ni ya kudhaniwa.
mt0: <pad> Kwa mujibu wa Owiny, ufungwa unalenga haswa kuzima siasa ya upinzani kwa sababu ya hofu ya serikali kuwa maoni na wasiwasi wa wananchi huenda kusababisha umma kuchukizwa, madai ambayo anasema ni uongo na sio msingi wa ukweli bali dhana.</s>

mt0: <pad> Mnamo Aprili 14, 2011, UCC ilielekeza ISPs kukataza muda mfupi upatikanaji wa Facebook na Twitter kwa 24 saa ili kuondoa maunganisho na kushiriki habari.</s>

en: In 2011, the elections were marked with SMS filtration that contained certain words including Egypt, bullet and people power.
swa: Mnamo mwaka wa 2011, uchaguzi ulikumbwa na uchujwaji wa ujumbe mfupi (SMS) wenye maneno fulani yakiwemo Egypt, bullet na people power.
mt0: <pad> Katika 2011, uchaguzi ulikuwa unatambuliwa na filtration SMS ambayo ilijumuisha maneno kama vile Misri, bunduki na nguvu za watu.</s>

en: In the lead up to the 2006 elections, the UCC instructed ISPs to block access to the website of Radio Katwe for publishing malicious and false information against the ruling National Resistance Movement and its presidential candidate, according to a 2015 ICT policy briefing by Collaboration on International ICT Policy for East and Southern Africa (CIPESA).
swa: Kuelekea uchaguzi mkuu wa 2006, UCC iliagiza watoa huduma za mtandao (ISPs) kuzuia upatikanaji wa wavuti ya Radio Katwe kwa kuchapisha habari mbovu na za uongo dhidi ya chama tawala cha National Resistance Movement na mgombea wake wa urais, kwa mujibu wa chapisho la sera ya tehama la 2015 la Collaboration on International ICT Policy for East and Southern Africa (CIPESA).
mt0: <pad> Katika kampeni ya uchaguzi wa 2006, UCC ilielekeza ISPs kukataza upatikanaji wa tovuti ya Radio Katwe kwa kuchapisha habari za kisiasa na uongo dhidi ya harakati za upinzani zinazotawala National Resistance Movement na mgombea wake wa urais, kulingana na 2015 ICT policy briefing by Collaboration on International ICT Policy for East and Southern Africa (CIPESA).</s>

en: Ugandan authorities blocked access to the radio station and the Daily Monitor website for publishing independently tallied election results.

mt0: <pad> Uganda imekataza upatikanaji wa redio na tovuti ya Daily Monitor kwa kuchapisha matokeo ya uchaguzi yaliyohesabiwa kibinafsi.</s>

en: As the 2021 election approaches, Uganda authorities are very likely to continue to crack down on political dissent, including through social media shutdowns.
swa: Wakati uchaguzi wa 2021 unapokaribia, kuna uwezekano mkubwa kuwa utawala wa Uganda utaendeleza ukandamizaji wa wapinzani, ikiwa ni pamoja na kufunga mitandao ya kijamii.
mt0: <pad> Kama uchaguzi wa 2021 unakaribia, mamlaka ya Uganda inaonekana kuendelea kudhibiti upinzani wa kisiasa, ikiwemo kupitia kufungwa kwa mitandao ya kijamii.</s>

en: In fact, since the 2016 elections, there has been no change in the legal framework that allows the government to restrict the rights to freedom of expression and access to information online.
swa: Kwa kweli, tangu uchaguzi wa 2016, hakujakuwepo na mabadiliko katika mfumo wa kisheria ambao unaruhusu serikali kuzuia haki ya uhuru wa kujieleza na ufikiaji wa habari mtandaoni.
mt0: <pad> Kwa kweli, tangu uchaguzi wa 2016, hakuna mabadiliko ya mfumo wa kisheria ambao unaruhusu serikali kudhibiti haki za uhuru wa kutoa maoni na kupata habari kwenye mitandao.</s>

en: According to the 2016 State of Internet Freedom in Africa report,  the 2013 Communications Act gives UCC broad powers and functions under Section 5 that permits the communications regulator to monitor, inspect, license, supervise, control, and regulate communications services and to set standards, monitor, and enforce compliance relating to content.
swa: Kwa mujibu wa 2016 State of Internet Freedom in Africa report, Sheria ya Mawasiliano ya 2013 inaipa UCC nguvu zaidi na inafanya kazi chini ya kifungu cha 5 kinachoruhusu mdhibiti wa mawasiliano kufuatilia, kukagua, kutoa leseni, kusimamia, na kudhibiti huduma za mawasiliano na kuweka viwango, kufuatilia, na kutekeleza uzingatifu unaohusu taarifa.
mt0: <pad> Kwa mujibu wa ripoti ya 2016 ya Uhuru wa Mtandao Afrika, Sheria ya Mawasiliano ya 2013 ina uwezo mkubwa na majukumu chini ya Kifungu cha 5 ambayo inaruhusu mamlaka ya mawasiliano kufuatilia, kuangalia, kuidhinisha, kusimamia, kudhibiti, na kudhibiti huduma za mawasiliano na kuweka viwango, kufuatilia, na kuimarisha uzingatifu kuhusu yaliyomo.</s>

en: At the request of the government, the UCC used this section to order ISPs to block access to social media and mobile money services during the 2016 elections.
swa: Kwa ombi la serikali, UCC ilitumia sehemu hii kuagiza watoa huduma za mtandao (ISPs) kuzuia ufikiaji wa mitandao ya kijamii na huduma za pesa kwa njia ya simu wakati wa uchaguzi wa 2016.
mt0: <pad> Kwa maombi ya Serikali, UCC ilitumia kifungu hiki kuamuru ISPs kukataza upatikanaji wa huduma za mitandao na fedha za simu wakati wa uchaguzi wa 2016</s>

en: The government continues to weaponize these laws to control public debate and to silence political dissent, particularly at times of elections.
swa: Serikali inaendelea kutumia sheria hizi kudhibiti mijadala ya umma na kunyamazisha wapinzani wa kisiasa, haswa wakati wa uchaguzi.
mt0: <pad> Serikali inaendelea kutumia sheria hizi kama silaha kudhibiti majadiliano ya umma na kuzima upinzani wa kisiasa, haswa wakati wa uchaguzi.</s>

en: Owiny argues that the state is capable of shutting down the internet at any time deemed necessary: Where regime security and that of its citizens converges, and where regime security is threatened, the regime security and its survival will take precedent.
swa: Owiny anatoa hoja kwamba serikali ina uwezo wa kuzima mtandao wakati wowote ule inapoonekana kuna umuhimu huo: Pale ambapo usalama wa serikali na ule wa raia wake unaingiliana, na pale usalama wa serikali unapotishiwa, usalama wa serikali na uponaji wake utapewa kipaumbele.
mt0: <pad> Owiny anapendekeza kuwa serikali inaweza kukataza mtandao wakati wowote watakapohitajika: "Kila mahali ambapo usalama wa kisiasa na wa wananchi wake unaunganishwa, na kila mahali usalama wa kisiasa unatishiwa, usalama wa kisiasa na uzima wake utakuwa wa kwanza."</s>

en: Nongovernmental organizations and human rights defenders have been organizing in Uganda so that shutdowns like the ones that took place in 2016 dont happen again.
swa: Asasi zisizo za kiserikali na watetezi wa haki za binadamu wamekuwa wakijiandaa nchini Uganda ili ufungaji kama ule uliofanyika mwaka wa 2016 hautokei tena.
mt0: <pad> Mshirika wa kijamii na wanaharakati wa haki za binadamu wamekuwa wakijipanga Uganda ili kuhakikisha kuwa shutdowns kama zile zilizofanyika 2016 hazifanyiki tena.</s>

en: Several organizations wrote a joint letter to the African Union and regional bodies asking them to condemn the decision by Ugandan authorities to shut down internet access during the 2016 elections.
swa: Asasi kadhaa ziliandika barua ya pamoja kwa Jumuiya ya Afrika na mashirika ya kikanda zikiyaomba kulaani uamuzi wa utawala wa Uganda wa kufungia ufikiaji wa mtandao wakati wa uchaguzi wa 2016.
mt0: <pad> Baadhi ya mashirika waliandika barua pamoja kwa Umoja wa Afrika na shirika la kiregionali wakiomba wao kupinga uamuzi wa mamlaka ya Uganda kukataza upatikanaji wa mtandao wakati wa uchaguzi wa 2016</s>

en: Unwanted Witness Uganda took the Ugandan state to court, along with internet service providers and the regulator, in a case filed in September 2016.
swa: Shirika la Unwanted Witness Uganda liliipeleka serikali ya Uganda mahakamani, pamoja na watoa huduma za mtandao (ISPs) na mdhibiti wa mawasiliano (UCC), katika kesi iliyowasilishwa mnamo Septemba 2016.
mt0: <pad> Unwanted Witness Uganda ilipeleka Uganda kwa mahakama, pamoja na wahudumu wa huduma za intaneti na mratibu wa huduma za intaneti, katika kesi iliyowasilishwa Septemba 2016, ambayo imeanza kushughulikiwa mwezi uliopita.</s>

en: The organization contended that the internet shutdown planned by the state violated the rights of Ugandans to personal freedom of speech and expression is enshrined in Article 29(1) of the 1995 constitution.
swa: Shirika hilo lilionyesha kwamba hatua ya ufungwaji wa mtandao iliyopangwa na serikali ilikiuka haki za raia wa Uganda za uhuru wa kusema na kujieleza kama inavyoelezwa kwenye kanuni za kifungu cha 29 (1) cha katiba ya 1995.
mt0: <pad> Mtandao huo ulisema kuwa serikali ilifanya uamuzi wa kuzima mtandao kwa muda mfupi kwamba uhuru wa kibinafsi wa maoni na maelezo unapatikana katika Kifungu cha 29(1) cha katiba ya 1995.</s>

en: However, a judge ruled that the applicants failed to prove any violations that resulted from the shutdowns, Unwanted Witness Uganda told Global Voices.
swa: Hata hivyo, jaji alitoa uamuzi kwamba upande wa mashtaka ulishindwa kuthibitisha ukiukwaji wowote uliotokana na ufungwaji huo, Unwanted Witness ililiambia shirika la Global Voices.
mt0: <pad> Lakini, mahakama ilitoa uamuzi kuwa waombaji walishindwa kuonyesha uhalifu wowote uliosababisha kufungwa kwa njia hii, Unwanted Witness Uganda ilisema Global Voices.</s>

en: Achieving uninterrupted access to the internet  particularly during the upcoming elections  will require more advocacy.
swa: Kufanikisha kutokatishwa kwa ufikiaji wa mtandao  hasa wakati wa uchaguzi ujao  kutahitaji utetezi zaidi.
mt0: <pad> Kutimiza upatikanaji wa mtandao bila kuingiliwa haswa wakati wa uchaguzi unaokuja unahitaji zaidi kampeni.</s>

en: Owiny suggested the need for digital rights activists to deepen conversations between the government and private sector to present the negative impact of shutdowns because the private sector is intimidated by the state.
swa: Owiny alipendekeza hitaji la wanaharakati wa haki za dijitili kuongeza mazungumzo kati ya serikali na sekta binafsi kuwasilisha athari mbaya za ufungwaji kwa sababu sekta binafsi inatiwa hofu na serikali.
mt0: <pad> Owiny apendekeza kuwa wanaharakati wa haki za kidijitali waongeze mazungumzo kati ya serikali na sekta binafsi ili kuonyesha athari mbaya ya kufungwa kwa sababu sekta binafsi inaogopwa na serikali.</s>

en: Uganda was among the first African countries to enact a right to information law, known as the Access to Information Act (ATIA), in 2005.
swa: Uganda ilikuwa miongoni mwa nchi za kwanza barani Afrika kutunga sheria ya haki ya raia kupata habari za umma, inayojulikana kama Access to Information Act (ATIA), mnamo 2005.

en: The law promises to provide efficient, effective, transparent and accountable that will enable the public to effectively access and participate in decisions that affect them as citizens of the country.

en: Thousands of visitors to the historic city of Stone Town, Zanzibar, have followed the sound of music to the Dhow Countries Music Academy (DCMA), a music school that promotes and preserves the islands musical traditions of the Swahili Coast along the Indian Ocean.
swa: Maelfu ya wageni wanaozuru Mji Mkongwe, Zanzibar, mji wa kale uliofahamika kubeba historia  kubwa ya visiwa hivyo, hufuatilia sauti ya muziki unaorindima kutoka DCMA, shule ya muziki inayolenga kutangaza na kutunza muziki wa mwambao unaofahamika kuwa na asili yake visiwani humo na maeneo mengine ya pwani ya Bahari ya Hindi.
mt0: <pad> Thousands of visitors to the historic city of Stone Town, Zanzibar, have followed the sound of music to the Dhow Countries Music Academy (DCMA), a music school that promotes and preserves the island's musical traditions of the Swahili Coast along the Indian Ocean.</s>

en: Since 2002, the school has promoted and preserved the Zanzibar's unique mix of Arab, Indian and African cultures through music.
swa: Tangu mwaka 2002, shule hiyo imekuwa ikiutangaza na kuutunza utamaduni huo wa kipekee wa Zanzibar unaochanganya tamaduni za ki-Arab, ki-Hindi na ki-Afrika kupitia muziki.
mt0: <pad> Tangu mwaka wa 2002, shule imekuwa ikiendeleza na kuhifadhi Zanzibar's unique mix of Arab, Indian and African cultures through music.</s>

en: After 17 years, the school faces a financial crisis that threatens its closure.
swa: Miaka 17 tangu kuanzishwa kwa shule hiyo, sasa ni wazi inakabiliwa na hali mbaya ya kifedha inayotishia kufungwa kwake.
mt0: <pad> Baada ya miaka 17, shule inakabiliwa na shida za kifedha ambazo zinatishia kufungwa.</s>

en: Nearly 70% of its 80 full-time students can't afford to pay their tuition, which comes to about $13 USD per month, according to an official DCMA press release.
swa: Karibu asilimia 70 ya wanafunzi 80 wanaosoma shuleni hapo hawana uwezo wa kulipa ada ya masomo, ambayo ni kiasi cha dola za Marekani 13 kwa mwezi, kwa mujibu wa taarifa rasmi ya DCMA kwa umma.
mt0: <pad> Nkaribia 70% ya wanafunzi wake 80 wa kidato cha tano hawawezi kulipa ada zao, ambayo inakadiriwa kuwa $13 USD kwa mwezi, kulingana na taarifa iliyotolewa na DCMA.</s>

en: While the school has received support over the years from international donors and diplomatic missions, they face a gap in funding that may force them to shut their doors at the historic Old Customs House.
swa: Ingawa shule hiyo imekuwa ikipokea misaada kutoka kwa wafadhili wa kimataifa na mashirika ya kirafiki, kwa sasa inakabiliana na ombwe kubwa linaloweza kulazimisha kufunga virago vyake na kuondoka kwenye Jumba hilo la kihistoria mjini Zanzibar, linalofahamika kama Old Customs House.
mt0: <pad> Wakati shule imepokea msaada kutoka kwa wafadhili wa kimataifa na misheni za kidiplomasia, wanakabili ukosefu wa fedha ambao huenda ikawalazimisha kufunga milango ya Old Customs House iliyokuwa maarufu sana.</s>

en: Without crucial funds to continue, DCMA students and staff fear that the soulful sounds that flow through the hallways of this iconic institution that make these islands sing  may cease.
swa: Bila kupata fedha za haraka kuwezesha shughuli zake kuendelea, wanafunzi na walimu wa DCMA wana wasiwasi kwamba sauti zilizozoeleka kurindima kutoka kwenye viunga vya jengo hilo na kufanya visiwa vipate burudani ya sanaa  zinaweza kukoma.
mt0: <pad> Bila fedha muhimu kuendelea, wanafunzi na wafanyakazi wa DCMA wanaogopa kwamba sauti za kiroho zinazotoka kwenye kumbi za taasisi hii ya kipekee inayofanya visiwa hivi kuimba huenda zikakoma.</s>

en: The school not only teaches and promotes traditional culture and heritage through music, but it's also home to a community of young musicians who seek alternatives to making a living as creatives.
swa: Shule hiyo si tu hufundisha na kutangaza utamaduni na urithi wa asili kupitia muziki, lakini pia hukaliwa na kundi kubwa la wanamuziki vijana wanaotafuta njia mbadala za kuendesha maisha yao kwa kutumia sanaa.
mt0: <pad> Sio tu shule inafundisha na kuendeleza utamaduni wa kiasili na urithi kupitia muziki, lakini pia ni nyumbani kwa jamii ya wasanii vijana ambao wanatafuta njia za kufanya maisha ya kiubunifu kama wabunifu.</s>

en: Drawing from a complex history of Indian, Arab and African exchange, the school celebrates the influence of dhow countries, with inspiration from cultures that converged along the Indian Ocean and the Persian Gulf.
swa: Ikiwa na vionjo vya historia ya India, Urabuni na Afrika, shule hiyo inafurahia kuwa matokeo ya tamaduni za nchi mbalimbali, ikiwa na utamaduni uliunganishwa kwenye eneo lal Bahari ya Hindi na Ghuba ya Uajemi.

en: The Omani Sultanate, a major maritime force from the 17th to 19th centuries, shifted its seat of power from Muscat to Zanzibar in 1840.

en: From Stone Town, Omani kings oversaw elaborate systems of maritime trade, including cloves, gold, and textiles, powered by strong winds that set dhows  traditional Arab vessels  sailing across the Indian Ocean, from India to Oman to East Africa.
swa: Kutoka Mji Mkongwe, watawala wa Omani waliendesha biashara ya baharini, ikiwa ni pamoja na karafuu, dhahabu, nguo, wakitegemea safari za vyombo vilivyoongozwa na upepo kati ya kingo ya Bahari ya Hindi nchini India kwenda Oman na Afrika Mashariki.
mt0: <pad> From Stone Town, wafalme wa Oman walisimamia mifumo ya biashara ya majini, ambayo ilijumuisha cloves, gold, and textiles, inayoendeshwa na upepo mkali ambao uliamsha dhows traditional Arab vessels sailing across the Indian Ocean, from India to Oman to East Africa.</s>

en: Young Zanzibaris recognize the importance of connecting with the past to determine their future and the music created today expresses that desire to bridge the old with the new.

en: The Swahili coast tells the story of epic cultural exchanges and the DCMA continues this tradition through its musical collaborations.

en: Every year, the school hosts an initiative called Swahili Encounters, matching well-known musicians hailing from Africa, the Middle East, Europe and North America with DCMA students to create original musical compositions within a week-long period.

en: At the end of the encounter, the newly-formed collaboration performs at Sauti za Busara, and many of these collaborations turn into life-time friendships that transcend the boundaries of language and culture, proving music is a universal language.

en: On August 12, the World Health Organization (WHO) announced a positive development in the clinical trials of drugs being tested for the treatment of Ebola in the Democratic Republic of Congo (DR of Congo).
swa: Mapema tarehe 12 Agosti, Shirika la Afya Duniani (WHO) lilitoa taarifa chanya ya maendeleo ya michakato ya kitabibu ya majaribio ya dawa kadhaa za kutibu ugonjwa wa ebola nchini Jamhuri ya Kidemokrasia ya Congo (Jamhuri ya Congo).
mt0: <pad> Mnamo Agosti 12, Shirika la Afya Duniani (WHO) limetangaza maendeleo mazuri katika majaribio ya kliniki ya dawa zinazojaribiwa kwa matibabu ya Ebola katika Jamhuri ya Kidemokrasia ya Congo.</s>

en: WHO asserted that the Ebola drugs showed advances that will bring patients a better chance of survival, and further affirmed that two out of the four drugs being tested are more effective in treating Ebola.
swa: WHO ilitanabaisha kuwa, dawa za ebola zilizojaribiwa zimeonesha matokeo chanya yatakayoleta matumaini ya kuishi kwa wagonjwa wa Ebola, na kuendelea kueleza kuwa dawa mbili kati ya nne zilizojaribiwa zimeonesha kuwa na uwezo mkubwa wa kutibu Ebola.
mt0: <pad> WHO inasema kuwa dawa za Ebola zimeonyesha mafanikio ambayo yatapelekea nafasi nzuri ya kuishi kwa wagonjwa, na kuongeza kwamba dawa mbili kati ya nne zinazofanyiwa majaribio ni bora zaidi katika matibabu ya Ebola.</s>

en: Who is the man behind the Ebola cure?

mt0: <pad> Who is the man behind the Ebola cure?</s>

en: Esteemed professor Jean-Jacques Muyembe-Tamfum, director-general of the Institut National de Recherche Biomédicale (INRB) DR of Congo, who invested a substantial part of his adult life treating the virus.
swa: Mheshimiwa Profesa Jean-Jacques Muyembe-Tamfum, Mkurugenzi Mkuu wa Institut National de Recherche Biomédicale (INRB) DR ya Congo, aliwekeza sehemu kubwa ya Maisha yake katika kutafuta tiba ya kirusi cha Ebola.
mt0: <pad> Prof. Jean-Jacques Muyembe-Tamfum, Mkurugenzi wa Idara ya Kitaifa ya Utafiti wa Matibabu (INRB) DRC, ambaye aliwekeza sehemu kubwa ya maisha yake ya kibinafsi kupambana na virusi, ambaye ametumia sehemu kubwa ya maisha yake ya kibinafsi kutibu virusi.</s>

en: While the international media has often focused heavily on the deadly, contagious nature of Ebola in DR of Congo, less has been said about the Congolese scientist who discovered its cure.
swa: Wakati vyombo vya ahabari vya kimataifa vikiwa vinaripoti kwa kiasi kikubwa kuhusu namna ugonjwa wa Ebola unavyosababisha idadi kubwa ya vifo nchini Congo, habari za kumhusu mwanasansi huyu zinazungumzwa kwa kiasi kidogo sana na vyombo hivi vya habari.
mt0: <pad> Wakati vyombo vya habari vya kimataifa mara nyingi vimezingatia sana juu ya ubaya wa Ebola katika DRC, kidogo imezungumzwa kuhusu mtaalamu wa Congo aliyegundua matibabu yake.</s>

en: Muyembe-Tamfum declared: We will no longer say that EVD [Ebola virus disease] is not curable.
swa: Muyembe-Tamfum  alieleza : kuwa hatutasema tena kuwa ugonjwa wa  Ebola (EVD) hautibiki.
mt0: <pad> Muyembe-Tamfum alisema: "Hatutaki kusema tena kuwa EVD [Ebola virus disease] ni ambukizi, lakini inaweza kutibiwa."</s>

en: Based on Muyembe-Tamfum's tireless work, scientists tested four drugs for Ebola treatment: ZMapp, remdesivir, mAb114 and REGN-EB3.
swa: Kutokana na kazi adhimu ya Muyembe-Tamfum, wanasayansi walifanya majaribio ya dawa nne za kutibu Ebola: ZMapp, remdesivir, mAb114 and REGN-EB3.
mt0: <pad> Kwa kutegemea kazi ya Muyembe-Tamfum, wanasayansi walijaribu dawa nne kwa matibabu ya Ebola: ZMapp, remdesivir, mAb114 na REGN-EB3.</s>

en: The results from the clinical trials conducted in 499 study participants showed that patients treated with REGN-EB3 or mAb114 had a greater chance of survival when compared to those treated with the two other drugs.
swa: Majibu ya majaribio ya kitabibu conducted kwa washiriki 499 wa utafiti yalionesha kuwa wagonjwa waliotibiwa kwa REGN-EB3 au mAb114 walionesha kuwa na nafasi kubwa ya kupona ukilinganisha na wale waliotibiwa kwa dawa nyingine mbili.
mt0: <pad> Matokeo ya majaribio ya kliniki yaliyofanyika kwa washiriki 499 wa utafiti walionyesha kuwa wagonjwa waliotibiwa na REGN-EB3 au mAb114 walikuwa na nafasi kubwa ya kuishi wakati kulinganisha na wale waliotibiwa na dawa mbili nyingine.</s>

en: The trials were conducted under the auspices of the Institut National de Recherche Biomédicale (INRB), the DR Congo Ministry of Health and three medical humanitarian organizations: the Alliance for International Medical Action (ALIMA), the International Medical Corps (IMC) and Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF).
swa: Utafiti huu uliofanyika chini ya uangalizi wa taasisi ya Institut National de Recherche Biomédicale (INRB), Wizara ya Afya ya Congo pamoja na mashirika mengine matatu yanayojihusisha na utoaji wa huduma za afya: Jumuia ya Kimataifa ya Masuala ya Afya (ALIMA), the International Medical Corps (IMC) na Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF).

en: Hungarian pro-government media outlets have launched new attacks against Blanka Nagy, a high school student who has spoken out against the government at several protests since late 2018.

en: Nagy has endured criticism of her intellect and even sexual harassment, with one outlet calling her a whore.

mt0: <pad> Tangu maandamano ya kijamii dhidi ya Rais Daniel Ortega katika Nicaragua mwezi Aprili 2018, serikali imekataza maandamano, amekamata maelfu bila kufanya kesi, na imefunga mitandao ya kisiasa na ya kawaida.</s>

en: As attempts at dialogue have so far failed, the future of Nicaragua remains an open question.
swa: Majaribio ya kufanya mazungumzo yameshindikana,  kwa sasa hatma ya Nicaragua imebaki kuwa swali gumu.
mt0: <pad> Kama jitihada za mazungumzo zimeshindwa hadi sasa, baadaye ya Nicaragua inabaki kuwa swali wazi.</s>

en: The demonstrations were originally against a social security reform that would raise income taxes while reducing pension benefits.

mt0: <pad> Maandamano yalianza awali dhidi ya mabadiliko ya usalama wa jamii ambayo ingeongeza kodi za mapato huku ikipunguza mafao ya pensheni.</s>

en: The initial crackdown by the authorities paved the way for a nationwide call for the resignation of President Daniel Ortega and first lady and Vice-President Rosario Murillo.

mt0: <pad> Msamaha wa kwanza wa mamlaka uliamsha msukumo wa kutaka kujiuzulu kwa Rais Daniel Ortega na Mke wa Kwanza na Naibu Rais Rosario Murillo.</s>

en: Figures given for the protests death toll vary, and have not been updated since last year as barriers to documentation efforts increase.

en: In December 2018 the government closed down several NGOs that were keeping track of police violence and human rights abuses, including the Nicaraguan Center for Human Rights (Cenidh) and the Institute for the Development of Democracy (Ipade).

mt0: <pad> Mwezi Desemba 2018 serikali ilifunga mashirika yasiyo ya kiserikali kadhaa ambayo yalifuatilia unyanyasaji wa polisi na ukiukwaji wa haki za binadamu, kama vile Kituo cha Haki za Binadamu cha Nicaragua (Cenidh) na Taasisi ya Maendeleo ya Demokrasia (Ipade).</s>

en: Also in December, two groups set up by the Inter-American Commission for Human Rights (IACHR)the Special Follow-up Mechanism for Nicaragua (MESENI) and the Interdisciplinary Group of Independent Expertswere expelled from the country, leaving Nicaragua virtually without independent human rights observers and opening a new stage in the repression, according to Nicaraguan feminist activist and educator María Teresa Blandón.

mt0: <pad> Kwa wakati huo, vyama vya upinzani vinaita kwa maandamano kukumbuka kumbukeni ya tukio la Aprili 2018.</s>

en: With the refusal of authorities to grant permission to the demonstration, new police crackdowns are anticipated.
swa: Kukiwa na katazo toka kwa mamlaka na zuio la kibali dhidi ya maandamano hayo, pia inatarajiwa kuwa kutakuwepo na ukandamizaji mpya kutoka kwa polisi.
mt0: <pad> Kwa kukataa kwa mamlaka idhini ya maandamano, ukamataji mpya wa polisi unatarajiwa.</s>
